texts.es: Noel Agustin de 37 años de edad casado , tiene por actividad economica venta de marisco como( pescado , boca colorada, curbina, lisa, camarones, jaiba, punches, concha, chanpainanos) ubicada en su casa de habitacion, en la cual tiene por experiencia 25 años , ya que desde muy temprana edad inicio el negocio con sus padres, en la actualidad ha crecido gracias a su esfuerzo personal , al apayo que leon 2000 le ha brindado, en conjunto con el programa kiva lo cual ha permito que su negocio sea prospero y rentable , por los financiamiento que le han brindado ya que mejorar las condiciones y calidad de sus productos.
texts.en: Noel Agustin is 37 years old and married.  He works selling seafood such as fish (boca colorada, curbina, lisa), shrimp, crab, crayfish, conch, and chanpainanos from his home.  He has 25 years of experience since he started this work from a young age with his parents.  Currently, the business has grown thanks to his personal effort, support that Leon 2000 has provided along with the Kiva program, which has allowed his business to be prosperous and profitable thanks to the loans that he has been given to improve conditions and the quality of his products.

loans.use: to purchase fish (boca colorada, curbina, lisa), shrimp, crab, crayfish, conch, and chanpainanos

loans.name: Nixsa Veronica

texts.es:
La Señora Nixsa es una persona muy trabajadora dedicada 100% a su trabajo. Actualmente vive con su madre y hermanos no tiene hijos, vive en el departamento de Choluteca Honduras. Y Se dedica a su negocio propio fábrica y venta de pan.
Doña Nixsa el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de harina, manteca, leña y azúcar. Este tipo de mercadería se vende mas en el verano.
Doña Nixsa espera que al finalizar la temporada de invierno pueda tener un buen capital y bastante producto. Ya que es una zona muy productiva, para tener más mercadería y de esta manera poder crecer con este tipo de negocio.
Doña Nixsa desea Seguir trabajando muy fuerte para poder ayudar a su madre y hermanos.
Choluteca, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Nixsa is a very hard-working person, dedicated 100% to her work.  She currently lives with her mother and siblings.  She doesn't have children and lives in the region of Choluteca, Honduras.  She works in her own business in which she makes and sells bread.  

Nixsa needs the loan to buy flour, butter, firewood and sugar.  This type of merchandise sells more in the summer.  Nixsa hopes that when the winter season ends, she will be able to have good capital and enough product.  Since it is a very productive region, having more merchandise will help this type of business be able to grow.

Nixsa wants to continue working very hard to be able to help her mother and siblings.

Choluteca, Honduras - June 2012

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, firewood and sugar for her business.

loans.name: Kenia Suyen

texts.es:
La joven Kenia es una persona muy trabajadora dedicada a su trabajo. Actualmente vive con su esposo en el departamento de Choluteca. Y Se dedica a su negocio propio fábrica y venta de tortillas.
Kenia el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de maíz, leña y cal. Este tipo de producto se vende en todas las épocas del año. 
Kenia Espera que al finalizar la temporada de invierno tener un buen capital y bastante producto. Y a si tener más producto y de esta manera poder crecer con este tipo de negocio.
Kenia desea seguir trabajando muy duro para poder ayudar a su familia especialmente a sus hijos.
Choluteca, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
The young Kenia is a very hard working woman dedicated to her work. She lives her husband in the Choluteca department. She makes a living with her own business and sale of tortillas. 

Kenia needs this loan to buy corn, firewood and lime. This type of product is sold all year round. Kenia hopes that at the end of the winter season she will have a good amount of capital and enough product. With having more product she will be able to grow in this business. Kenia hopes to continue working very hard to be able to help her family, especially her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime.

loans.name: Bun

texts.en:
Bun is 31 years old and a married woman living in Ang Snoul district. She earns a living by sewing clothes for a garment factory in Phnom Penh city. She earns a decent salary to spend on food and daily allowances for her young kid attending school. Bun’s husband also works for a small company to support his family.

Bun wants to have this loan to fix her present house because recently it’s suffered from the rain. Her house was built on the lower part of the land, and the water often comes into her house when there is a big rain. To solve the problem, she is asking for a loan to purchase building supplies such as cement, sand, and small stones to make a concrete floor. This will protect the family, especially during the rainy season.

loans.use: to purchase building supplies such as cement, sand, and small stones to make a concrete floor.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a 50-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines who has been in a fishing venture together with her husband for about five years now. At this time, she is asking for a loan worth 5000 PHP which she will use to buy additional fish netting and for the maintenance of their fishing materials. Esterlita believes that this loan would be a great help because it will give them the resources that they need for the improvement of their fishing business.

Esterlita works really hard just to help her husband in providing for the needs of the entire family, especially for their four young children. 

She hopes that their fishing business would develop and grow so that it could help them in providing and in meeting their needs. Moreover, she can continually send her children to school and provide their basic needs and healthcare.

loans.use: to buy additional fish netting

loans.name: Luis Arnulfo

texts.es: Luis Arnulfo de 42 años, casado con tres hijos menores tiene por actividad economica servicio de molino ubicado en su casa de habitacion, el  esta solicitando el financiamiento para hacerle mejoras a su casa como es cambiar el piso de la vivienda y hacerle reparaciones al techo , con el prestamo el comprara especificamente zicn, cemento, arena, ladrillo rojo,  clavos, alfajillas entre otros. Y de esa forma el cumplira uno de sus sueños como es mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en: Luis Arnulfo is 42 years old and married with three children who are minors. He works at a service mill located in his house. He is requesting financing to make improvements to his house including redoing the floor of his house and making repairs to the roof. With the loan he will buy zinc, cement, sand, red bricks, nails and wooden boards, among other items. In this manner, he will fulfill one of his dreams, which is improving his family's situation.

loans.use: to buy zinc, cement, sand, red brick, nails and wooden boards, among other items.

loans.name: Elia Mariella

texts.es: Elia mariela , casada, con dos hijos menores de edad tiene por actividad economica la venta de mercaderia en general , tiempo de tener el negocio 10 años, lo distribuye de forma ambulante,  Elia Mariela incio dicha actividad porque un familiar le empezo enviando meracaderia del extrajero la cual vendia de forma ambulante en la actualidad ha incrementado sus venta por lo tanto necesita del financiamiento que fundacion leon 2000 le ha brindado al igual que el proyecto kiva,lo cual le ha permitido  invertir en mercaderia y sastifacer la demanda de sus clientes la mercaderia que ofrece es la siguiente: pantalones, camisas, short, blusas femeninas, ropa interior, zapatos, sandalias, tuallas, entre otros.
texts.en:
Elia Mariela is married, and has two minor children. She has a business selling general merchandise, and has had the business for ten years.

She sells her merchandise as a street vendor. Elia Mariela started this activity because a family member began sending her merchandise from abroad, which she would sell as a street vendor. 

Now she has increased her sales, and therefore needs the loan that Fundación León 2000 as well as Kiva have offered her. This has allowed her to invest in merchandise and meet the demand from her customers. 

She sells the following merchandise: pants, shirts, shorts, women's blouses, underwear, shoes, sandals, towels and other goods.

loans.use: To buy pants, shirts, shorts, women's blouses, underwear, shoes, sandals, towels and other goods.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana Patricia  soltera  de 41 años con dos hijos menores de edad, esta emprendedora tiene por actividad economica la  venta de productos varios como ( posicles, chicles,  golosinas,  galletas, gelatinas, sopas maruchas, entre otros) actividad que la realiza desde hace 10 años  motivada por la necesidad que tiene de mantener  a sus hijos y brindarles lo necesarios para su mantencion ya que estan estudiando y necesitan  de todo su apoyo para sacarlo adelante y que forme como  personas intregrante y profesionales,
texts.en: Ana Patricia is 41 years old, single, and has two young children.  She works selling various products such as popsicles, gum, candy, cookies, gelatins, ramen noodles, and other items.  She has done this work for 10 years.  She is motivated by having to provide for her children and give them the things that they need since they are in school and need all of her support to get ahead and become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase gum, candy, cookies, gelatin, ramen noodles, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es:
El Sr, José Jaime casado y tiene dos pequeños hijos, su esposa se dedica al hogar y el es empleado general de una empresa, vive en una de las colonias mas retiradas de la ciudad, donde persiste la inseguridad en todo momento por lo que necesita se le apoye para construir la barda de su casa, donde sus hijos tendrán una mejor protección y calidad de vida. Platicando con el señor nos dice.- Hoy en día no es que este de moda bardear la casa si no que ya es una necesidad cubrir la casas, uno no sabe que puede ocurrir un situación de inseguridad. 
Si construye la barda que tiene planeada será de gran beneficio para el y su familia y podrá salir un poco mas tranquilo de su hogar.
texts.en:
José Jaime is married and has two small children. His wife works at home and is a general employee of a business. He lives in one of the farther neighborhoods from the city, where insecurity persists at all times. As such, he needs help to build a fence around his house, so his children will have better protection and a higher quality of life. While chatting with him, he tells us: In today's day it is not fencing the house is a trend but it is a necessity; one never knows what can happen in an unsafe situation. 

Building the fence that he has planned will be a large benefit for him and his family, and he will be able to leave his house more peacefully.

loans.use: to build a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Lidia Mariana

texts.es: Lidia Marina de 52 años de edad del municipio de chichigalpa, casada con dos hijos mayores de edad tiene por actividad economica la venta de granos basicos y cosmeticos tiempo de tener el negocio 2 años, el cual lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, el negocio lo incio como oportunidad de incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su nivel de vida, con el financiamiento comprara: arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, maiz, arroz, jabon, maquillajes, perfumenes, cremas corporales entre otros.
texts.en:
Lidia Mariana is 52 years old, married, and has two adult children.  She is from the town of Chichigalpa.  She works selling basic grains and cosmetics.  She has had her business for two years, and it is located in her home.  She started the business as an opportunity to increase her income and improve her quality of life.  

With this loan, she will purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, soap, makeup, perfumes, body lotion, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, soap, makeup, perfumes, body lotion, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school expenses and re-enrollment.

loans.name: Khadijeh

texts.en:
Khadijeh is a 40-year-old married woman from Lebanon who lives with her husband and their three school-aged children. Ten years ago, she started to work in clothing stores.  After gaining the needed experience, she was able to open her own clothing business several months ago. Her store is located next to her town, and she offers a wide variety of clothing.   She strives together with her husband, who has worked as a truck driver since 1992 in order to satisfy the family needs and enhance their way of living. 

Today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to expand her store’s inventory of new summer collections. She’s certain that the loan will help her diversify her selection of merchandise.   In the future, she is hoping to also sell shoes from her store.

loans.use: to expand her store’s inventory of new summer collections

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es: EL SR. VICTOR ALFONSO DE 28 AÑOS, CASADO Y CON UN HIJO TRABAJA EN UN GRUPO MUSICAL DESDE HACE 3 AÑOS APROXIMADAMENTE, SU SUEÑO ES TENER SU PROPIO GRUPO POR LO CUAL QUIERE IR COMPRANDO POCO A POCO INSTRUMENTOS, PARA ASI GENERAR UN INGRESO MAYOR PARA BRINDARLE UNA ESTABILIDAD ECONOMICA A SU FAMILIA SIN TENER NECESIDAD  DE QUE TRABAJE SU ESPOSA. SOLICITA UN CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE UNA BATERIA PARA NO PERDER EVENTOS SOCIALES EN LOS CUALES SOLICITAN DE SU PRESENCIA YA QUE REALIZA UN BUEN TRABAJO.
texts.en: Victor Alfonso is 28 years old, married and has one child. He has worked in a musical group for about the past three years. His dream is to have his own group. As such, he wants to continue buying instruments, little by little, to generate a greater income and bring economic stability to his family without having  his wife needing to work. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of drums. This way he does not lose social events which request the presence of drums since he already does good work.

loans.use: to buy musical instruments.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Thirty-year-old Ruth is married to Sylvester and blessed with two children, aged 13 and 10 years. She sells maize, a business she started six years ago, and she earns a monthly income of KES 5,000. 


She has requested a second loan of KES 23,000 to purchase five bags of maize for sale. The profit earned from the business will contribute towards her buying a piece of land. 


Her dream is to see her children well educated.

loans.use: To purchase five bags of maize for sale.

loans.name: Jossely Karolina

texts.es:
Jossely es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, sus playas hermosas su agricultura en especial el cultivo algodón, maíz, y también por la pesca, podemos encontrar  también uno de los atractivos turísticos más visitados de la ciudad como lo es las Islas Ballestas y el Candelabro  de Paracas. A Josely le gusta mucho preparar postres en sus tiempos libres y sobre todo le gusta cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Cau Cau”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de administración.

Con mucho entusiasmo Jossely trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 30 clientes diariamente, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque trabaja muy duro, porque es mable con los clientes y sobre todo porque trabaja con muchas ganas para salir adelante y sobre todo porque gracias a su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos de su hogar.

Jossely está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como blusas, pantalones, polos, chompas, buzos, entre otros, así de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir creciendo y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de administración y apoyar a sus padres que tanto los quiere”.
texts.en:
Jossely is a young woman of 19 years old. She lives in the city of Pisco, a city that is characterized by its hot weather, beautiful beaches and its agriculture, particularly the cultivation of cotton, corn and fish. We can also find here one of the most visited tourist attractions of the city which is the islands of Ballesta and Candelabro de Paracas. Jossely enjoys preparing desserts in her free time and above all likes to cook of her favorite plates, which is the rich "Cau Cau". Due to her limited economic resources, she could only study up to the fifth year of secondary school but she would have enjoyed much to study administration. 

With much enthusiasm, Jossely works in her small business selling clothing. She works about 10 hours a day attends to up to 30 customers daily. She believes that her business is going very well for her because she works very hard, is friends with her customers and above all because she works with a great desire to get ahead. Further, thanks to her job she can support the household expenses. 

Jossely is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help that they have brought her she will be able to buy merchandise for her business including blouses, pants, polo shirts, sweaters and jogging suits, among other items. In this way she will be able to have a greater variety of products and improve her income, which will allow her to continue growing and fighting to make her largest dream come true: "To study the career of administration and support her parents that she loves so much". 
Jossely está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como blusas, pantalones, polos, chompas, buzos, entre otros, así de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir creciendo y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de administración y apoyar a sus padres que tanto los quiere”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: blouses, pants, polo shirts, sweaters and jogging suits, among other items.

loans.name: Izzatoy

texts.en: Izzatoy is a woman who likes to work hard. She is intelligent, secure, and kind-hearted. For more than 20 years, she has helped her parents with animal husbandry, which is why she has enough experience in this work.  She has a big family. Her sons went to Russia to find jobs. Her daughter-in-law is ill, and Izzatoy must help her pay for medicines.  Izzatoy's life demands a lot of money, so she decided to organize her own business. She took a  business course and learned ways of creating a business. She is asking a loan to buy cattle for starting a business. She waits your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle for starting a business

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 46-year-old married man from Lebanon. He is living with his wife and four relatives. He is the main breadwinner of the family, and he works very hard to be able to handle the heavy living expenses. He has been involved in the construction field for the past 24 years. He is talented at completing painting and gypsum work. He is well known for his original designs and decorations. 

And today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new painting tools to replace used ones, so he can achieve his work competently and present good quality services to the clients. He works on a freelance basis, and he hopes to become the owner of a paint shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase new painting tools to replace used ones

loans.name: Roy

texts.en:
This is Roy, 34, a resident of Dasmariñas, Cavite, Philippines. His wife is Donnalyn, a housewife, and a mother to his child. He, together with his wife, manages their household while operating his business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for his everyday expenses.  

Roy operates a barbershop business. It offers hair styling, hair grooming, and the like. He, together with his wife, handles the operations. Their regular customers are their neighbors and the local community.  He earns a minimum of 600 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help continue operations of his business, he is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. He will use the loan to buy supplies for his barbershop like shampoo, hair treatment creams, and oils, and other things needed for his business. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business.  

Roy dreams of being able to give his family a good future through all his hard work. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of his work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy supplies needed for his business.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a 42-year-old single woman living with one parent. She is from Lebanon. She has 12 years of experience working with mobile phones. Siham began working as an employee in a mobile shop and opened her own store in 2006. She sells a variety of brands of mobile phones in addition to related accessories. 

With her requested loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l, Siham will be able to increase her merchandise selection of new mobile phones and accessories and to purchase prepaid cell phone cards to sell. The majority of cellular phone users in Lebanon purchase these prepaid cards; it is less common to have an annual phone contract than it is in many Western countries. Siham reports that both her income and business sales will increase as a result of the loan. In the future, she is looking to further expand her business and increase its capital.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise selection of new mobile phones and accessories and to purchase prepaid cell phone cards to sell.

loans.name: Nora

texts.es:
Nora es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Santiago, tiene 4 hijos a quienes quiere mucho, algunos de ellos ya tienen su propia familia; lamentablemente por diversas circunstancias desde hace varios años se separó de su esposo; Nora siempre ha sido una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas culturales y noticieros en la televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Chilcano para compartir con sus hijos.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, desde hace varios años Nora puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ella realiza las ventas en su hogar y ofrece facilidades de pago a sus clientes, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 6 horas diarias; adicionalmente trabaja como obrera en una empresa agrícola de su ciudad, Nora es muy considerada y estimada por sus compañeros ya que tiene un buen desempeño y es muy amable con los demás.
Nora se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como: fierros, ladrillos y cemento;  de esta manera Nora podrá realizar la construcción del techo de su vivienda, obteniendo con ello mayor seguridad y bienestar para ella y sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Nora is a 46 year old woman who lives in the city of Santiago, and has four children whom she loves very much. Some of her children already have their own families. Unfortunately, due to a variety of circumstances, Nora has been separated from her husband for a number of years. She has always been a very happy person, hardworking and enthusiastic, and has dedicated all her efforts to raising her family well. In her free time, Nora likes to watch the news and cultural programs on television, and sometimes cooks a delicious pot of soup to share with her children.

With a lot of ambition and enthusiasm, Nora has run her own small clothing business for the past several years. She sells clothing out of her home and offers easy payment terms for her customers. She devotes about 6 hours every day to her small business; in addition, she works as a laborer in an agricultural company in the city. Nora is highly regarded and well-liked by her colleagues, because she performs her job well and is very kind to others.

Nora is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, and thanks to their assistance, will be able to purchase construction materials, such as iron, bricks, and cement. With these materials, Nora can build a roof for her home, which will give better security and well-being to her and her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials, such as iron, bricks, and cement.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en:
Abbas is a 36-year-old single Lebanese man living with one parent and two siblings. Over the years, he has developed good experience working as a home painter. He works in his town on multiple projects and also works upon customers’ requests. Abbas was capable of hiring a part-time employee to help him accomplish his work tasks. He works, in collaboration with his brothers, to provide better living conditions to his family. 

Today, Abbas is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to renew his business tools and purchase paints for a new project. He needs to be prepared to satisfy his clients and to earn a good business reputation. In the future, he hopes to take multiple construction projects in order to further expand his business operations.

loans.use: to renew his business tools and purchase paints for a new project.

loans.name: Zoraida Beatriz

texts.es:
Zoraida tiene 22 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, en esta ciudad se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, entre otros, asimismo se desarrolla la pesca y también el turismo ya que cuenta con las Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas los cuales son visitados por infinidad de turistas en todo el año. Zoraida en sus tiempo libres disfruta de hacer deporte sobre todo juega vóley con sus vecinas y amigas de su barrio y en ocasiones le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “cau Cau”. Debido a que sus padres no tenían muchos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de administración de empresas.

Con mucho entusiasmo y dedicación Zoraida trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida y abarrotes, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes diariamente, con el fruto de su trabajo ella puede apoyar con los gastos de su familia por ello trabaja con muchas ganas y por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque se esfuerza mucho y porque es amable con los clientes.

Zoraida está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar 2 mostradores para poder exhibir sus platillos y productos que ofrece en su negocio, de esta manera ella podrá tener un negocio más ordenado y sobre todo con mucha limpieza para que los clientes tengan más confianza y con ello mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de Administración”.
texts.en:
Zoraida is 22 and lives in the city of Pisco,

Pisco is known for having a warm and friendly weather, in this city agriculture is common, specially they grow cotton, corn and others. There is also fishing and tourism in Pisco because  there are places like the Ballestas Islands and the "Candelabro de Paracas" [Paracas' chandelier]  that are visited by a big amount of tourists all year round.

On her free time, Zoraida enjoys sports, she likes to play volleyball with her neighbours and friends from where she lives. From time to time she likes to have one of her favourite dishes: "Cau Cau" which she thinks it's delicious.

Due to her parents not having many economic resources Zoraida was only able to study until her fifth year of secondary school, but she would had loved to go to university and do Business Management. 

With lots of enthusiasm and dedication Zoraida works in her food and groceries business, she works 10 hours a day and can serve up to 30 customers a day. With the fruits of her work she can support her family's expenses, that is why she works with such good will and she thinks that is why her business is blooming, because she works hard and she is nice with her customers.

Zoraida is very grateful to the lenders of Kiva because with the help they have given her she will be able to buy two food counters to display her dishes and the products she sells in her shop, this way she will be able to have a better kept and above all very clean business so her customers will shop with more confidence and thus improve her profits so she can keep working towards making her big dream come true: to study Business Management

loans.use: to buy two food counters

loans.name: Ouch

texts.en:
Ouch lives in a small house with his family in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. He is 55 years old and has five children – three single children and two married children. He and his wife work together on their rice farm, generating a suitable income to satisfy their living necessities. For additional income, Ouch devotes his free time at home to helping his wife weave bamboo baskets. Despite their hardships, they want to lift the family out of poverty and provide their children a better quality of life.

To make improvements in his farming business, Ouch would like to take out a loan of KHR 1,500,000 to purchase chemical fertilizers for his rice crops. He is very happy to be provided funds because he will be able to work out his plans. In years to come, he wants to purchase extra lots of farmland to increase his rice production.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizers for his rice crops.

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en: Dalal is a 50-year-old woman. She lives with her husband Ahmad and their two children. Despite her older age, Dalal is obliged to work continually as she is responsible for helping her husband with their family expenses. Her younger child is also working to supplement the family income, while the other one is still attending school. Dalal started to sell clothes from her home to avoid the expense of renting a place. She provides her customers good quality products at fair prices. She is satisfied with what she has attained so far, even though she most wishes to enhance her family’s way of living. That’s why she’s asking today for a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new collection of clothes. In the near future, Dalal wishes to open her own clothing shop and maybe hire employees to help her achieve the work tasks and therefore earn higher income.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, and canned goods among other things

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es:
Juana tiene 51 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú. El distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, es un lugar donde se puede apreciar un paisaje hermoso por los sembríos de los diferentes productos que se cosechan en la zona, como algodón, uva, paprika, pallares, entre otros, asimismo se encuentran muchas empresas agroexportadoras las cuales brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a los pobladores de la zona. Juana es madre de 5 hijos de los cuales el menor de ellos tiene 14 años  y pro quien trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo con un buen ejemplo de que con trabajo y honradez uno puede lograr todo, lo que se proponga. A Juana le gusta mucho en sus tiempos libres ver televisión pero lo que más le gusta es cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos los riquísimos Chicharrones. Ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el tercer grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de administración de empresas.

Con esfuerzo y sobre todo dedicación Juana o Juanita como le gusta que la llamen trabaja en su negocio de venta de salchipollos, hamburguesas, patasca, pollos broster, gaseosas, entre otros, ella trabaja alrededor de de 5 horas al día y los fines de semana trabaja alrededor de 8 horas ya que hay mas clientela, ella puede atender hasta 25 clientes en el día y ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene una muy buena sazón para la preparación de sus platillos y por ello los clientes siempre regresan.

Juana está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mesas, sillas y poder reparar su carrito sanguchero ya que actualmente se ha malogrado de manera seguida y a veces  demora en la atención a sus clientes, con esta mejora ella podrá brindar una atención más rápida y darle comodidad a sus clientes, con ello mejorara sus ingresos y podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Tener una gran pollería”.
texts.en:
Juana is 51 and she lives in the district of Santiago, Ica, Peru.

The district of Santiago is known for having a warm and friendly weather, it's a place where you can find beautiful scenery because of the plantations of the different crops that are grown in the zone like: cotton, grape, paprika, lima beans and others, likewise you can find many agricultural exporting companies which give jobs to the inhabitants of the zone. 

Juana is the mother of 5 children, the youngest of whom is 14 and she works very hard to be able to give him a dignified life, and above all the good example that with hard work and honesty one can achieve anything one sets out to do.

On her free time, Juana likes to watch television but what she likes the most is to cook one of her favourite dishes, the delicious "Chicharrones".

She was only able to study up to the third grade of secondary school but she would have loved to study Business Management.

With effort and above all dedication, Juana, or Juanita as she likes to be called works in her business selling "salchipollos" [hot dog and chicken], burgers, "patasca" [a highly nutritious beef and sheep soup], fried chicken, sodas and others, she works around 5 hour a day and on weekends she works around 8 hours because there are more customers; She can serve up to 25 customer a day and she believes her business is good because she is kind with her customers and above all because she has a good flavour for the preparation of her dishes and therefor her customers always come back. 

Juana is really grateful with the lenders of Kiva because thanks to their help she will be able to buy tables, chairs and fix her sandwich cart that gets damaged often and sometimes slows her when serving her customers; With this improvement she will be able to serve her customers faster and give them more comfortable premises, with that she will improve her profits and will be able to continue working towards her biggest dream, to have a big restaurant to serve her chicken.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs and to repair her sandwich cart.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a truck to use in his business

loans.name: Wissam

texts.en:
Wissam is a 29-year-old married man from Lebanon. He lives with his wife and only child, who attends school. He is the main income earner of the family. Wissam has owned a shop since 2010, where he serves hubble-bubble (hookah), a traditional Lebanese water pipe for tobacco. He delivers to a wide range of clients in his village and its neighborhoods. 

Today, Wissam is requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase tobacco and hubble-bubble equipment. In the future, he plans to borrow another Kiva loan so he can build a special tent beside his shop where his customers can relax and enjoy their time.

loans.use: to purchase tobacco and hubble-bubble (hookah) equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new construction tools for his business.

loans.name: Afif

texts.en:
Afif is a 62-year-old man. He lives in Lebanon. He’s married to Amal, a wonderful woman and the mother of his two children. The children are both working in addition to their father, who is considered the main income provider for the family. As he seeks to offer them a fair way of living, Afif works continually and nonstop to achieve his goal. 

Afif has owned a small school bus for four years. His job consists of transporting students upon request. He’s glad to work independently so that he can spend time with his family. Today, he’s looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new diesel engine for his bus. 

He confirms that this Kiva loan will allow him to transport students without facing problems and thus raise his income by 25 percent. This is how Afif works to earn superior income and help his children start their own business.

loans.use: to purchase a new diesel engine for his bus.

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured next to his taxi.

Wafaa is a 35-year-old woman. She is married and a mother of two sons and three daughters. Her husband has been a taxi driver for four years. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for the family, but the family needs more support to cover their needs and the taxi's costs.

Wafaa wants to help her husband in increasing the family's income, so she is requesting a US $1,000 loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of  licensing and insuring his taxi. This will enable Wafaa's husband to drive legally and safely from one area to another and to work extra hours, which will help to increase the family's income and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To pay for licensing and insuring her husband's taxi

loans.name: Elias

texts.en:
Elias is a single, 32-year-old Lebanese man living with his parents and three siblings who all work. With his family’s help, Elias has been able to manage his expenses and live a proper life. Despite all the difficulties that he has faced, Elias has been brave and unafraid to take on his own the whole family responsibilities. 

Elias started to work as a painter in 2000, and he still works as a painter. He works on a free-lance basis and is considered friendly, especially by his loyal customers. He is an expert in his field and knows very well how to deal with his clients. Today, he is requesting to a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional painting tools for his business in order to be able to handle his new projects. This Kiva loan will open a new door for him to take on bigger projects and increase his productivity by 30%. In the future, he plans to open his own painting shop.

loans.use: to purchase additional painting tools for his business

loans.name: Naji

texts.en:
Naji is a single man living with his parent and one sibling. He’s a 41-year-old hard worker looking to help his only brother with satisfying their family needs. Naji has many years of experience in his recent job. He’s a furniture painter who works with high professionalism. He works on different projects and always tries to offer his customers the best results he can. He’s known for being punctual and well-organized. 

Today, he’s asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to renew his painting tools. He will be utilizing the loan to facilitate and carry on his work in a proper way. 

Naji is grateful for all the good things God has given him. In the near future, he looks to take more projects, maybe outside the country if this will help him learn new designs and better develop his business.

loans.use: to renew his painting tools.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 42 years old. She is married and has five children between the ages of 10 and 23. All her children live at home with her.

For three years Rebecca has been selling bread, oil, sugar, and other food items. She started this business with money from her husband. Rebecca likes to be in business because it keeps her busy and popular.

Rebecca has requested a loan to purchase more bread, oil, sugar, rice, and other food products. She wants to save money so that in the future she can have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more bread, oil, sugar, rice, and other food products.

loans.name: Sophat's Group

texts.en:
Sophat is 40 years old and lives in a rural village in the Ratanak Mondul district of Cambodia. She has six children, of whom two daughters and one son are still dependent on her. She has planted rice and raised pigs for ten years and supplements her income by selling groceries. She can earn around KHR 12,000 per day from her current businesses.

Sophat has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles and successfully paid back the past loans, while the other members of her group have been with VisionFund for two cycles. The past loans have helped Sophat earn a better living. She is leading her group of three female members to apply for a loan from VisionFund of KHR 1,400,000 each. As the leader, Sophat is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland, as well as to buy pig feed and grocery items for her store. With this loan, she hopes to expand her current business and to increase her income to improve her living standards.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, rice seeds, pig feed, and grocery items.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 39 years old and lives in the Jacob Town area. She is married and has four children between the ages of 12 and 17 who all live at home and attend school. 

For the past 12 years, Elizabeth has been involved in the sale of red oil, flour, sugar, rice, and onions. Her main challenges are the rise of prices and the low quantity of goods. She started this business with help from her husband who gave her money, and she learned her business from her mother. Elizabeth says what she like about this business is that during the dry season she earns more money and what makes her proud is that the business enables her to send her children to school. Elizabeth has requested this loan to purchase more red oil, flour, sugar, rice, and onions for her business. She hopes in future to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil, flour, sugar, rice, and onions for her business.

loans.name: Martha Maria

texts.es:
Martha tiene 31 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, sus playas hermosas, su agricultura en especial el cultivo de maíz, algodón, entre otros, asimismo por la generosidad de sus pobladores. Martha vive al lado de su esposo quien trabaja como  chofer de taxi y en temporada de invierno trabaja como albañil, juntos se apoyan con los gastos propios del hogar. Martha en sus tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música y sobre todo porque se relaja un poco del cansancio propio del trabajo. Ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar administración de empresas.

Con mucho esfuerzo Martha trabaja en su negocio de peluquería, ella le dedica alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 12 clientes diariamente, es muy creativa y sobre todo ordenada por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio ya que también trata de manera amable a sus clientes.

Martha está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales para su negocio como tintes de buena calidad, talco, cremas de cabello, shampoo al por mayor, tijeras, cortadoras de cabello entre otros, con esta mejora ella tendrá los materiales necesarios para poder realizar su trabajo y sobre todo dar una mejor atención a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos asi ella seguirá trabajando y luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa de material noble y tener unas gran peluquería”.
texts.en:
Martha is 31 years old and lives in the city of Mala, which is characterized by its warm and welcoming climate, its beautiful beaches, its agriculture (especially the cultivation of corn and cotton), as well as the generosity of its residents. Martha lives with her husband, who works as a taxi driver and also seasonally in the winter as a bricklayer. Together, they cover the expenses of their household. In her free time, Martha likes to listen to music, and more than anything, to relax a little from the demands of her work. She only has a secondary-level education, but she would have liked to study business administration.

Martha puts a lot of effort into her beauty salon, to which she devotes around 10 hours each day and serves up to 12 clients daily. She is very creative and above all, organized. Martha believes that this is why her business does well, and also because she is very friendly toward her clients.

Martha is very grateful to Kiva lenders, and thanks to their help, she will be able to purchase materials for her salon, like good quality dyes, talcum powder, hair creams, wholesale shampoo, scissors, and hair clippers, among other things. With this improvement, she will have the necessary materials to be able to perform her work and above all, to provide better service to her clients and increase her income. In this way, she will continue working and struggling to make her greatest dream a reality: "to finish building our house from good quality materials and to have a great beauty salon."

loans.use: to purchase salon supplies (good quality dyes, talcum powder, hair creams, wholesale shampoo, scissors, and hair clippers, among other things)

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 29-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and six siblings. Ahmad is trying his best to be a good support for his family, especially because all are cooperating to be able to live a better life. He has many years of experience in farming and started his own business many years ago. He raises cattle on his own farm. He also benefits from selling dairy products and earning money in return.  He takes good care of his cattle, and he’s sure that it will return him big profits. 

Today, he needs to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to renovate his farm and purchase the needed quantity of cattle. Ahmad expects to make his farm one of the biggest farms in the country because of his great passion for his work. This will develop his business and boost his productivity. In the future, he plans to buy new land and expand his business.

loans.use: to renovate his farm and purchase the needed quantity of cattle.

loans.name: Samean's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Sangke district of Cambodia, Samean is 29 years old and married. She has one daughter who is in her care. To make a living, Samean does rice farming on one hectare of farmland, and she is able to earn about KHR31,600 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Samean’s group consists of two members. She has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle and successfully paid back the past loan. Now she is applying for a loan with her group member, who just started with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seed for her farmland. She hopes to make more rice to make her family's lives better.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seed.

loans.name: Ghaleb

texts.en:
Ghaleb is a 41-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children, who are attending school. He has been working as a taxi driver since 2002. His main route is between his town and the surrounding villages; and he also provides private transportation upon client request. His business income is very important as he represents the only income source for the family. 

Today, he is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform the needed maintenance on his car, such as changing the tires, repairing the engine and painting the body, etc. He states that these repairs will make his transportation safer and will help him attract more customers. This is his first Kiva loan, and he hopes to be able to improve his business as well as the family’s financial situation.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his car, such as changing the tires, repairing the engine and painting the body, etc.

loans.name: Erick Suheyl

texts.es:
Erick es un joven de 19 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Ingenio, Nazca, Perú. El distrito de ingenio se caracteriza por  desarrollarse la agricultura en especial el cultivo de tuna, cochinilla, frejoles, pallares, frutales como el mango y la naranja entre otros, asimismo podemos encontrar la iglesia de san jose la cual está construida a base de manera y data de la época colonial, también destaca por su gastronomía en especial la preparación de los riquísimos chicharrones, los cuales son el plato favorito de Erick. Erick en sus tiempos libres disfruta de escuchar música pero de vez en cuando le gusta salir a pasear o conversar con sus amigos de su barrio, Erick estudio la carrera de obstetricia pero le gustaría seguir la carrera de administración de empresas.

Con mucho entusiasmo Erick trabaja en su negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas, cervezas y abarrotes al por mayor, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y ofrece sus productos a los diversos caseríos que se encuentra en su distrito en especial cuando hay fiestas patronales en donde vende sus productos en mayores cantidades , el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy organizado y porque conoce mucho los caseríos y siempre sabe cuando son las festividades de la zona y los clientes siempre lo buscan.

Erick está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como golosinas, productos de uso domestico como platos, vasos, jarras, entre otros, ya que los clientes siempre le piden estos productos, de esta manera el podrá tener más variedad de productos y podrá mejorar sus ingresos, así el podrá seguir creciendo y poder cumplir uno de sus grandes sueño:” comprar una movilidad para poder trasladar sus productos”.
texts.en:
Erick is a 19-year-old young man and he lives in the district of Ingenio, Nazca, Peru. 

The district of Ingenio is known for developing in agriculture, specially the farming of prickly pear, cochineal, beans, Lima beans, fruit trees like mango and orange and others, One can also find the church of San José [Saint Joseph] which is built on the way of and dates from the colonial era. Ingenio also stands out for its gastronomy, specially the preparation of the delicious "Chicharrones" [fried pork rind] which are Erick's favourite dish.

On his free time Erick enjoys listening to music, but every once in a while he likes to go away or talk with his friends from his neighbourhood.

Erick studied to be an obstetrician but he would like to study Business management.

With lots of enthusiasm Erick works in his business selling sodas, beers and groceries in bulk, he works around 10 hours a day and offers his products to the different settlements that are in his district specially when there are celebrations for the feast day of a town's patron saint which is when he sells his products in bigger quantities.

He believes that his business is going well because he is very organised and because he knows the settlements very well and he know when are the celebrations in the surrounding zones and so his customers always look for him.

Erick is really grateful with Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have provided him he will be able to buy merchandise for his business like sweets, domestic use products like dishes, glasses, jars and others because his customers are always asking him these products. This way he will have a bigger variety of products and will be able to improve his profits, then he will be able to keep his business growing and then realise one of his biggest dreams, to buy a vehicle to be able to transport his products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like sweets, domestic use products like dishes, glasses jars and others

loans.name: Dioni Ofilia

texts.es:
Dioni  tiene 56 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo se caracteriza por su agricultura como el cultivo de arroz, algodón, frejoles pallares, entre otros, también se desarrolla la pesca sobre todo la pesca de camarones, asimismo se caracteriza por la amabilidad de sus pobladores. Dioni está casada y junto a su esposo tiene 2 maravillosos hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y son el regalo más grande que Dios le ha dado en sus tiempos libres le gusta ver televisión en especial sus novelas favoritas o programas de comedia, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “arroz chaufa”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo tuvo estudios primarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar una carrera universitaria. 

Día a día Dioni trabaja en su pequeña parcela de cultivo en la cual ha sembrado maíz y pallares, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día ya que sus cultivos requieren mucho cuidado cuando lo riega y abona; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y dedicada.

Dioni está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar abono y fertilizantes para su cultivo, ya que su cultivo está creciendo y en esta etapa aparecen alguna plagas, con esta mejora podrá tener una mejor cosecha y su cultivo seguirá creciendo sin problema lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y seguir adelante para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Ser una gran agricultora”.
texts.en:
Dioni is 56 years old and lives in the city of Camaná, a city which is characterized by having a very warm and friendly climate. At the same time, it is characterized by the cultivation of rice, cotton and lima beans, among other items. Fishing has also developed, above all shrimp fishing. The city is also known for the friendliness of its people. Dioni is married and with her husband she has two wonderful children whom are already older and are the greatest gift that God has given her. In her free time she likes to watch television, especially her favorite soap operas and comedy shows. She also enjoys eating on of her favorite dishes, which is the delicious "arroz chaufa". Due to her parents' limited economic resources, she one went to primary school but would have liked to study for a university degree.

Each day Dioni works her small parcel of land in which she has planted corn and lima beans. She works about 10 hours a day because her crops require much care when she waters and fertilizes the land. She believes that her business is going well for her because she is very responsible and dedicated. 

Dioni is very thankful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help that they have brought her, she will be able to buy fertilizers for her crops since her crops are growing and at this time some plagues are appearing. With this improvement, she will be able to have a better harvest and her crops will continue growing without any problem. This will allow her to continue working and moving forward to be able to make her largest dream a reality: "To be a great farmer".

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en: Epifania is 53 years old from the town of Cortes, Bohol. She is married with five grown children. While her husband works as a mechanic, she is into cooking and selling of snack foods and home-cooked meals. This has been her business for 15 years now. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for her food vending business like seasoning, cooking oil, sugar, meat and groceries for family use like bath soap, detergents and food. Epifania will use her income for her family's daily consumption and business expansion.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like seasoning, cooking oil, sugar, meat and to buy groceries for family use

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en: Youssef is a 26-year-old single man from Lebanon. He is living with his parents and four siblings, two of whom are working. He has been working in the construction field for more than eight years. He got involved in this type of business at a very young age in order to give extra financial support to the family.  Today, he is asking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase construction tools and supplies to proceed with his business operations properly. He has a part-timer helping him with the work and he plans to hire him as a full-timer as soon as he is sure that he will be able to achieve a significant expansion in his business and increase his capital thanks to the loan.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools and supplies

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 19-year-old single man living with his parents and two siblings. He started his career two years ago working as a painter. He works on a freelance basis sticking with multiple projects and working on his client’s demands. Today, he is applying for a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase painting tools. He has to be outfitted with the needed equipment in order to build a good business reputation and satisfy his customers. With his business income, he is able to help his father with the family expenses, but Hasan is very ambitious and he intends to work harder to enhance the family’s way of living and help them meet their needs.

loans.use: to purchase painting tools

loans.name: Tirsa

texts.en:
Tirsa is a 41-year-old married woman and a resident of Panglao, Bohol, Philippines. She has eight children, ages 23, 20, 18, 10, 8, 6, 3 and a 7-month old baby. She has been in the business of dried fish vending and fishing for almost 14 years. Her husband is a fisherman, and she works hard to support the family. 

The business is a lucrative one, and she wanted to make a further investment in it. However, Tirsa doesn’t have enough capital for the sustainability of her business. At this time, she is asking for a loan worth 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) for her to use in buying dried fish stock for her growing number of customers and to buy fishing net for their fishing business.

Tirsa hopes that she could expand her ventures and earn as much as she can so that she will be able to serve more buyers. Most importantly, she wanted to send her children to school for their welfare and for their bright future.

loans.use: to buy dried fish stock to sell and to purchase fishing nets.

loans.name: Ana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Ana es una joven de 22 años de edad, vive en la linda, calurosa y acogedora ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por sus lindas playas, por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, entre otros así como también por su pesca, también podemos apreciar atractivos turísticos como “las Islas Ballestas y el Candelabro de Paracas”. Ana en su tiempo libre disfruta de jugar vóley con sus amigas y vecinas de su barrio pero o que más le gusta es comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Cau Cau”. Ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios ya que sus padres no tenían muchos recursos económicos, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Hotelería y turismo.

Con mucho entusiasmo y sobre todo optimismo Ana día a día trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 35 clientes diariamente, Ana lleva trabajando en su negocio desde hace ya un año y ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene una buena sazón para la preparación de sus platillos y sobre todo que es muy conocida por los clientes.

Ana está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias  a la ayuda que el han brindado ella podrá renovar sus materiales de trabajo ya que comprara mesas, sillas, espejos para colocar en las paredes, manteles nuevos, servilleteros, entre otros, así de esta manera mejorar la presencia de su negocio y dará mas comodidad a sus clientes lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir trabajando cada día para poder salir adelante y cumplir su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera y sobre todo tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Ana is a young woman of 22 years old. She lives in the pretty, warm and friendly city of Pisco. The city is characterized by its beautiful beaches, agriculture--particularly cotton and corn as well as fishing. We can also appreciate the tourist attractions such as the islands of Ballestas and Candelabro de Paracas. In her free time Ana enjoys playing volleyball with her friends and neighbors but what she likes the most is eating one of her favorite dishes, the very rich "Cau Cau". She only reached secondary school because her parents did not have sufficient economic resources, but she would have liked to study Hotel Management and Tourism. 

With much enthusiasm and above all, optimism, Ana works daily in her business where she sells food. She works about 10 hours a day and is able to attend to uo to 35 customers daily. Ana has been working in this business for one year already and believes that it is going well for her because she brings good seasoning in the preparation of her plates and above all is very well known by her customers. 

Ana is very thanksful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help that is being brought to her she will be able to obtain new supplies for work, including tables, chairs, mirrors for the walls, new tablecloths and napkin rings, among other items. In this way she will improve the appearance of her business and make her customers more comfortable, allowing her to increase her earnings and continue working each day to move forward and fulfill her greatest dream: to study for a career and above all, have her own house.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, wall mirrors, new tablecloths and napkin rings, among other items.

loans.name: Roth's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural area located in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Cambodia, Roth is 48 years old and married. She has three children, two of whom (one son and one daughter) are dependent on her. Her dependent son is still in school while her daughter works at the family's business. To make a living, she buys fish for resale in a local market while her husband helps with the family's business. She has been in this business for 10 years.  She is able to earn about KHR 30,000 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Roth’s group consists of four female members. She received her first loan from VisionFund six cycles ago and completely paid back her past loans. Roth successfully used the loans to support her business and family. Now the group is requesting a new loan of KHR 100,000 each. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy more fish to sell. With this loan, she hopes to earn more income to keep her son in school and live a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Rayane

texts.en: Rayane is a 23-year-old Lebanese single woman who lives with her parents. She has worked from her home as a female hairdresser since 2006. She helps her father with expenses to be able to satisfy the family's needs. She is very talented at her job and always makes her clients happy thanks to her endowed expertise.  Today, Rayane is asking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase hairdressing tools and beauty products. She aims to strengthen her business operation by expanding her work and targeting a wider clientele in order to amplify her income. She is very optimistic and willing to open her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase hairdressing tools and beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables such as cabbages, bananas, root crops and tomatoes.

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Ek Phnom district, Cambodia, Chreb is 37 years old and married with six children, three of whom are dependent on her. Chreb has been involved in selling fish in a local village for five years. She is able to earn around KHR 30,000 per day from her current business. 

Chreb has been with VisionFund for three cycles and completely paid back the past loans. The other group member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She is leading this group of two female members to apply for a loan from VisionFund. As the group leader, she is going to use her loan to buy more fish to sell. She hopes to improve her family's living and increase the income from her current business.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana, 38, is from Mombasa, Kenya. She operates a juice and water selling business, selling from her home. She is married to an accountant and they are blessed with six children, all attending school. Her children help her to sell during the evening when they come home from school. She says that she is pleased with her progress because the business is profitable and she has a regular set of customers.

She can count, too, on her children for extra support. She is applying for a loan because she wants to expand the range of products she sells. She will use the loan to buy food coloring, fruit, and water. For the future, she wants to continue the business and do what she can to help her family get ahead.

loans.use: to buy food coloring, fruit, and water.

loans.name: Mara Naydu

texts.es:
Mara es una joven de 20 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú, el distrito de Parcona se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo se puede encontrar uno de sus atractivos turísticos el cual es el “Bosque de Piedras”, en el cual encontramos formaciones rocosas en  forma de animales, personas, entre otros. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Mara le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su pequeño de 1 año de edad, al cual saca adelante sola ya que el padre de su pequeño la abandono y desde ese momento se ha convertido en padre y madre de su hijo y por el cual ella lucha dia a dia para darle una vida digna y sobre todo con mucho amor.  Mara solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración de empresas.

Día a día Mara trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, trabaja alrededor de 6 horas al día ya que va ofreciendo sus productos de casa en casa y diariamente puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con  los cliente y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad a precios cómodos.

Mara está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comparar mercadería para su negocio como pantalones, chompas, polos, cafarenas, entre otros, ya que se acerca la temporada de fiestas patrias y siempre los clientes realizan pedidos de sus productos, de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y podrá mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y sobre todo seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijos y sobre todo tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Mara is a 20 year old young lady. She lives in the district of Parcona, Ica, Peru. The district of Parcona is characterized by a warm climate, and you can also find one of the tourist attractions which is the Stone Forest where rock formations are found in the shape of animals, people and others. When she has free time Mara likes very much to go for a walk with her little 1 year old, which she is bringing up alone since the father of her child abandoned her and from then on she has become both mother and father of her son for whom she fights day by day to give him a dignified life and above all one with much love. Mara only went to high school, but she would have liked to study business administration.

Mara works daily in her business of selling clothing for women, men and children. She works about 6 hours a day and offers her products from house to house and can serve up to 15 customers a day. She believes that her business is going well because she is very friendly with her customers and above all because she offers products of quality at affordable prices.

Mara is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to the help that they have given she will be able to buy merchandise for her business such as pants, sweaters, polos, pullovers, among others, as the holiday season is approaching and the customers always place orders for her products. In this way she will have more variety of products and she can improve her earnings, which will allow her a better quality of life and above all to continue fighting each day to be able to fulfill her greatest dream: give her children a good education and above all to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, sweaters, polos, pullovers and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweaters, jackets, pants and running suits, among other items.

loans.name: Dianhua

texts.en:
Dianhua  is a 28-year-old mother of a four-year-old son from Sikatuna, Bohol, Philippines. She is currently in a hog-raising business and she finds it profitable and improving. She works hard in her business hoping that it can help her sustain and meet their daily financial needs.

Dianhua currently needs additional capital for her business. She is asking for a loan of 6000 PHP to buy additional piglets and feed. She is certain that through a loan, she could buy what she needs for the growth and development of her business. 

Dianhua is looking for a better future for her business and she hopes that one day it will metamorphose into a higher-yielding investment. With the income from the business, she can provide a better future for her son and put some money into her savings for future use.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed for the hogs

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en:
Pablita has started up a business in her children's school, where she prepares and sells food for the students. Her venture has proved to be a big success. However, she lacks sufficient capital to properly finance the new business. She also raises hogs. She is is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 12,000 for the dual purpose of buying necessary supplies for her food business and to expand her hog-raising business. She is confident that an investment in both of these businesses will significantly increase her income.

Pablita lives with her husband and three children in Bohol. Her children are aged 12, 13, and 15 years old and are enrolled in school.

With her loan funds, Pablita will buy such essential items as meat, rice, and vegetables for her food business and will also purchase piglets to raise. She is hopeful that, through perseverance and hard work, she can improve her business and earn more to apply toward the sustenance of her family's daily needs. In addition, she wants to ensure her children's continuous access to education and to make sound reinvestments in her businesses.

loans.use: buy meat, rice, and vegetables for her food business and to purchase piglets to raise

loans.name: Zubeda

texts.en:
Zubeda is a widow who has four school-going children. She has been selling charcoal for over six years. She says that this is her sole source of income. She dreams of opening a charcoal depot in future. Zubeda is an enterprising woman who does not fear risks. Her goal is to make sure that her children are educated and become professionals so that they can help her in her old age.

She lives in her own house that has electricity but no piped water. She says that her greatest challenge is high transport cost, since she has little capital. She thanks Kiva and Yehu for the assistance given to her, even as she hopes to expand her business so as to increase her clientele.

The loan of Ksh 30,000 will be used to purchase sacks of charcoal for sale.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is 34 years old and is married, with three children. One is in school while two are adults and independent. She operates a cafe where she sells foodstuffs such as dumplings, flat breads, rice, etc. Her niece helps her with the daily chores. She has been in this business for over ten years. 

Since she became a client of Yehu, she has learned how to save because she has been trained in financial management. She hopes to expand this business and have it become a restaurant. Fatuma needs a loan of KES 100,000 to purchase rice, wheat and maize flour, sugar, and cooking oil. 

Her clients like her because of her motherly caring nature since most of her clients are young and she treats them like her children.

loans.use: purchase rice, wheat and maize flour, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Jeremiah

texts.en:
Jeremiah is a married man. He has five children with ages ranging from 2 years to 17 years. He describes himself to be a patient, caring and determined man. He operates a retail store where he sells charcoal. He has been involved in this business for seven years. His business is located within a busy area  and his primary customers are local residents. 

Jeremiah describes his biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. He will use the Kes 5,800 loan to purchase a solar lantern. His business goal is to be a wholesaler and distributor of charcoal  within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children and build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lantern.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is 45 years old. She is married and resides in her own house that has electricity but no piped water, in Coast Province, Kenya. She has been selling coconuts from her home for more than two years.  She also operates a food stall where she sells a variety of foods including rice, dumplings, tea, etc. Her husband is a business person while her sons are also working.

Due to lack of funds, Mwanaisha is requesting a loan of Ksh 50,000 to purchase coconuts, rice, beans, and wheat flour. This money will help her expand her businesses and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and open a cereal shop. Moreover, she hopes to build a rental house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase coconuts, rice, beans, and wheat flour.

loans.name: Lizle Ann

texts.en:
Lizle Ann is a 26-year-old housewife from Catagbacan, Bohol.  She is married and her husband works as a driver. She is presently investing in a food business in their locality. She is trying to assist her husband by engaging in said business.

As of now, Lizle Ann lacks additional capital for her business and she is asking for a loan worth 5000 PHP in order to buy additional stocks of processed meats such as chorizo and hotdogs. Chorizo is a fresh or cured sausage in the Philippines. They are available in the Spanish style and the Chinese style. They are used in dishes which have Spanish and Chinese influences, such as Philippine-style paella, and 'Pancit canton'.

Lizle Ann hopes that her business will improve and expand in the future thus giving her the opportunity to earn more to reinvest, save and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of processed meats like chorizo and hotdogs

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is taking out another loan to start another business. She is grateful for the previous loans as she says that she has been able to save and start this current business. She has started a tailoring business. However, she continues to sell cloth and coconuts from her home. She has a small cloth shop where she works hard every day.

She started in this line of work with a friend who taught her how to sew. Her cousin  helps her at times in her daily work. She is requesting a loan of Ksh 80,000 to purchase bundles of cloth, sacks of coconuts, and two sewing machines. She thanks Kiva and Yehu for the opportunity she is receiving, because it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of cloth, sacks of coconuts, and two sewing machines.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a charcoal vendor. This is a business she has been running for almost eight years. She is a hard-working, kind person. She and her husband have three children: two daughters who attend school and one very young son. Her husband is a driver and she describes him as a responsible father who does not want his family to lack any basic necessities.

Mwanamisi tells us that she received the starting capital for her charcoal sales business from her husband, and that she now wants to improve her business through the purchase of 10 sacks of charcoal to offer for sale.

She aspires toward opening a charcoal depot in future. She is determined to secure her children's education so that they may pursue professional careers.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sacks of charcoal to offer for sale

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is a 32-year-old married man. He has a child who is nine years old. He describes himself as an aggressive man. He owns a lorry with which he provides transportation services to customers for example carrying luggage and their harvest such as cereals to various destinations. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. 

Philip's business is located within a residential area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. He will use the Kes 42,000 loan to purchase  two  water tanks. His business goal is to purchase another lorry  within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will buy a plot of land using the anticipated profits.

loans.use: to buy two tanks worth Kes 21,000 each.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
This is 37-year-old Mwanakombo. She is a widow and without children.  She established her retail kiosk after getting a contribution from her brother, and she says that she is now doing well. 

She works full time in this business since it is her only business and the source of income she depends on. She has shown her interest in being an entrepreneur since she is organized in her work and she knows how to handle customers. This has made her have a large clientele. 

Mwanakombo would like a loan in the amount of Ksh 50,000 which will be used to add a variety of fast-selling goods to her kiosk stock. In the future, Mwanakombo plans to open a wholesale business. This loan will help to increase her income and improve the business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to add a variety of fast selling goods to her kiosk stock.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi, age 48, has been a merchant for three years. She is engaged in a food stall business and sells a variety of foods to the neighborhood and the general public. She is a hard-working and dedicated person.
