The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more seeds and seed multiplication and pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Veronica De La Concepcion

texts.es: Verónica de la concepción tiene 36 años de edad con dos hijos esta emprendedora inicio su  actividad económica desde hace 20 años  cómo  es Bar y restaurante ofreciéndoles a sus cliente servicios de comideria, gaseosa, jugos  y licores nacionales e internacionales. El financiamiento lo está solicitando para invertir en la compra de licores, jugos, gaseosas, carne, arroz y los ingredientes para cosinar etc.
texts.en: Verónica de la Concepción is 36, and has two children. Twenty years ago, this entrepreneur started her bar and restaurant business, offering customers prepared foods, soft drinks, juices, and local and international liquors. The funding she is requesting will be used to buy liquors, juices, soft drinks, rice, cooking ingredients, etc.

loans.use: to buy: liquors, juices, soft drinks, rice, cooking ingredients, etc.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 54 years old and lives in Candanay Norte, Siquijor, Siquijor.  She is married with two adult-aged children. 
 
Gloria engaged in a backyard piggery project. She is a government employee.  She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to use for training expenses of her son's upgrading course as a seaman.  

Gloria has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for one year.  In the future, Gloria hopes to see her son complete his studies and soon be able to help the family.

loans.use: To pay for training expenses of her son for upgrading course as seaman

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is married. She has six children between 9 and 18 years. She wants the loan for buying more seeds and supporting her labor costs so that she can get the best harvest possible. She plans to use the profits to provide food for her family.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more seeds and support her labor costs

loans.name: Zhanna

texts.en:
Zhanna is still running her trading business. Thanks to her business she was able to pay for her son’s education and to repair her apartment; also she supports her family with business income. Now Zhanna’s son has a job and he helps his mother to support their family. 

Zhanna used her first Kiva loan to buy a large lot of swimsuits to resell. Now she is also asking for a $ 3,000 loan to buy men’s and women’s swimsuits and underclothes to resell.

loans.use: to buy men’s and women’s swimsuits and underclothes to resell

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: Jose Francisco casado ,con hijos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad economica el servicio de desgrane de maiz trillado de arroz, tiempo de tener el negocio 9 años, el cual lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion. Dicha actividad la inicio por una herencia de su papa el cual era el dueño del negocio al llegar a la mayoria de edad se lo sedio para seguirlo trabajando, en la actualidad implemto el trillo de arroz ya que la zona dode vive lo tiene como un negocio de mayor actividad, el objectivo del prestamo es para invertir en el techo donde esta ubicado el trillo y desgranadora, ya que de esa forma le ayudaria el programa kiva para mejorar la condidiciones para dar sus servicios.
texts.en:
Jose Francisco is married and his children are no longer minors. To earn a living, he provides corn husking and rice threshing services. He has run this business for nine years, and it is located at his home. He inherited this business from his father who previously owned it. When Jose Francisco reached an age of majority, his father handed it over to him so that it would keep going. He currently uses the rice threshing machine, as it generates more business in the area where he lives. 
The aim of the loan is to invest in the roof under which the threshing machine and the husker are located. So, the Kiva program would thus help him to improve the conditions under which he provides these services.

loans.use: to invest  in the roof under which the threshing machine and the husker are located.

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is from D'ban, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is 46 years old. Virgilia is married and has three children. She plants, harvests and sells bananas for a living. Virgilia has been engaged in her business for eight years and earns 8,000 PHP a month from it. In 2010, Virgilia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. 

Virgilia is requesting a new loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Musharaf

texts.en:
Musharaf has a large family. From first loan later 4 years that's why her children become elder and also she birthed a child. Now,she has four children from 22 to 30 years old. She loves, supports and always cares about her children. She also gives advice and supports them in their work. Her whole life she has been teaching them to be hardworking and purposeful people. Musharaf has changed her kind of business. 

Nowadays she is busy with cattle breeding and selling of bakery products in the Kistakuz and Kanibadam regions. Her loving husband always helps her as a friend and advises her every time. 

The number of her family is increasing from year to year, and that's why the parents are thinking about expanding their house. Musharaf is requesting a loan for buying building materials for renovating her house. She hopes for your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Freddy de 46 años de edad, casado  con un hijo mayor de edad, tiene por actividad economica  una librería  ubicada en su casa de habitacion , actividad que la inico desde hace 5 años , negocio que inico como una alternativa de trabajo que pudiera atender su hijo cuando no estubiera estudiando, el financiamiento lo quiere para comprar  equipo de trabajo y productos como. Vitrinas, estantes, libros, lapiceros, cuadernos, papel lustrio , folder, marcadores, resaltadores, broches de archivos, engrapadoras, calculadoras, saca grapas.  entre otros
texts.en:
46-year old Freddy is married and has an adult son. He earns his living running a bookstore from his house, a business he's had for five years. Freddy started his business as an alternative to a regular job so that his son could help in the store when he wasn't studying.

The loan he is seeking will be used to buy work tools and products such as display cabinets, shelves, books, pencils, notebooks, glossy paper, folders, markers, highlighters, file fasteners, staple removers, calculators etc.

loans.use: To buy display cabinets, shelves, books, pencils, notebooks, glossy paper, folders, markers, highlighters, file fasteners, staple removers, calculators etc.

loans.name: Perpetue

texts.en:
Perpetue is married. She has three children aged between five and fifteen. Two of them attend school. She wants this loan to pay for more seeds, seed multiplication, and support labor to get the best harvest. She plans to use the profits to pay school fees.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for more seeds, seed multiplication, and support labor.

loans.name: Annonciatha

texts.en:
Annonciatha is married. She has three children aged between 10 and 20, all of whom attend school. She wants the loan to buy more seeds, seed multiplication and support labor costs to get the best harvest. She plans to use the profits for paying school fees for the children. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). 

Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy seeds, seed multiplication and support labor costs.

loans.name: Vedaste

texts.en:
Vedaste is married. His wife is also a maize farmer. He has been a maize farmer for 6 years. He would like to get this loan to buy and harvest seeds and to pay for support labor to get the best harvest. With the profits, he wants to renovate his house.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy and harvest seeds and to pay for support labor.

loans.name: Byambadorj

texts.en:
Byambadorj is a 34-year-old married man who lives with his family in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia (an area that lacks basic infrastructure). He supports his family by operating a clothing sale business at the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. 

His wife helps him, while their elder son attends local primary school and their cousin babysits their daughter. Now, Byambadorj has 2.9 million Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) in working capital. He usually sells men's and women's clothes and blankets. In July, Mongolians celebrate the great traditional holiday Naadam, so Byambadorj needs more clothes to sell for the upcoming holiday.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell for an upcoming traditional Mongolian holiday, Naadam.

loans.name: Najla

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 32 years old, married and has three children. 

Najla has been a tailor since 2009; she makes, repairs, or alters clothing professionally such as suits, coats and trousers for women and kids. She has  sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is well-known in the surrounding areas. 

She is requesting a $2500 loan to purchase two sewing machines and a generator. She aims to make more money to offer her the opportunity to provide a better life for her family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase two sewing machines and a generator.

loans.name: Rahima

texts.en:
Rahima is very hardworking woman. Her friends know her as gentle, cute and good-natured. She always tries to find new ways of making income. She has a very difficult life as her husband went to Russia for finding a job. Rahima must feed and sustain her family alone. She is busy with animal husbandry and it is her way of getting money. 

She wants to repair her house but hasn't enough money; that's why she is asking for a loan to buy building materials. She awaits your help and support. If you will help her she'll improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing her house

loans.name: Mabomba Mengi Group

texts.en:
Balozi, who is in his late 30s, is married with four children. Two of them go to school and two of them are still young. He has been a tailor and also has been selling second-hand TVs, radios, DVD decks and speakers since 1999. He works from 7:00 am to 8:30 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be his seventh loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to start selling his second-hand products, paid school fees, made bricks, and for household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He wants a loan to buy more second-hand TV sets, radios, DVD decks and speakers to resell. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house. 

Balozi will share this loan with his loan group "Mabomba Mengi" with 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand TV sets, radios, DVD decks and speakers to resell.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a 32-year-old married woman and mother of three children. Five years ago, she opened up a convenience store selling a variety of foodstuffs, soft drinks, kitchen utensils and detergents. Over the years, Zeinab expanded her scope of work and increased her revenue generation by adding clothing to her offerings. 

Zeinab is applying for a loan from Kiva's Partner, Al Majmoua, which she will invest in increasing her supplies of foodstuffs and apparel. She will specifically focus on women's and children's clothing which seem to have high demand in her area. With the availability of the necessary capital, Zeinab will be able to employ her trade knowledge, experience and good reputation to achieve her business expansion and growth plans.

loans.use: to increase her supplies of foodstuffs and apparel

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto desde hace varios años a recibido el apoyo de nuestra empresa para el mejoramiento continuo de su vivienda y ahora necesita acondicionar la cocina enjarrandola, poniendole piso y pintandola. Actualmente esta pensionado por parte del instituto mexicano del seguro social ya que hace algunos años sufrió dos embolias que lo dejaron incapacitado para trabajar, el trabajaba en ferrocarriles mexicanos; dio gran parte de su vida a trabajar, ahora su esposa se esfuerza por sacara su familia adelante y que su esposo se sienta orgulloso de tener a una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que no se da por vencida y que a pesar de las circunstancias ella lo apoyara en todo.  Su esposa trabaja en una tienda en Laredo Texas como gerente de personal.
texts.en:
For several years now Roberto has received assistance from our organization to make continuous  improvements to his home. Now he needs to renovate his kitchen, plaster it,  put in a floor, and paint it.

Roberto currently receives a pension from Mexican Social Security as several years ago he got blood clots which left him unable to work at his job on the railways. A big part of his life was spent working; now his wife has to shoulder much of the work to help the family get ahead. He is proud of having such a hardworking enterprising wife who gives her all. In spite of the difficult circumstances she helps him with everything. She works in Laredo Texas as a personnel manager.

loans.use: To buy supplies to plaster, paint and put in a floor in his kitchen

loans.name: Carmelo

texts.es: Carmelo nos cuenta que desde pequeño ayudaba a su padre haciendo viveros de planta de café “recuerdo que con la ganancia de la venta de las plantas fuimos comprando poco a poco pequeñas parcelas que después fuimos sembrando con mi familia”.  Ahora él ha transmitido a sus hijos los conocimientos que su padre le enseñó y juntos trabajan produciendo café en la finca familiar. Desde hace varios años él es socio de la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” que es a donde entrega su café para que sea procesado y exportado. Durante la última cosecha su producción fue de 12 toneladas y para seguir manteniendo este nivel necesita de un crédito ya que tiene que reemplazar muchas de sus plantas que ya no dan el rendimiento deseado y debe comprar fertilizantes para sus terrenos. En un futuro le gustaría adquirir más terrenos para poder heredarles a sus hijos un buen patrimonio para que trabajen y puedan independizarse.
texts.en: Carmelo tells us that when he was little he used to help his father grow coffee plants. "I remember that with the earnings from selling the plants we bought parcels of land little by little which we planted with my family."  Now he has passed on to his children the knowledge that his father taught him and together they work producing coffee on the family farm. He has been a member of the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” for several years, where he delivers his coffee to be processed and exported. During the last harvest, his production was 12 tons and to maintain this level he needs a loan, since he has to replace a lot of his plants that don't give the yields he seeks and he has to buy fertilizer for his land. In the future he would like to acquire more land to be able to leave his children a good inheritance so they can work it and become independent.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Azizmoh

texts.en: Azizmoh is a woman who has the best qualities of people; she is very kind and clever. Azizmoh has a high degree and she is a teacher. Her income isn't  enough for feeding or keeping her family and that’s why she has her own business deal. She is busy with animal husbandry. In this business too, Azizmoh helps her husband. They have an 11-year-old son. Azizmoh wants to do all her best for her son. She wants to develop her business to buy young cattle, but her income isn’t enough. She awaits your help and support. If you will help her, she would be happy.

loans.use: To buy cattle for a developing business

loans.name: La Victorine Group

texts.fr: La cliente Bachinane est membre du le groupement  d’affaire Victorine, elle est mariée et mère de 3 jeunes enfants. Son mari commissionnaire dans un comptoir de pierres précieuses (minerais). La cliente est vendeuse de boissons Primus. Elle est sociétaire d’un petit Nganda (bistro), organisée à son  domicile. Elle commença son entreprise avec son fonds propre. Plus tard, elle sollicita le soutien de l’IMF Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 2 casiers de Primus et 2 casiers d’Amstel. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son appui  et autonomisation des petits entrepreneurs femmes. Il sied de signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en: Bachinane is a member of the business group Victorine. She is married and has three young children. Her husband is a doorman for a store selling precious stones (minerals). Bachinane sells Primus beer. She is the shareholder of a small Nganda (bistro) that is located in her home. She used her own savings to start the business. Later, she sought help from the micro-finance institution Hekima. This new loan will enable her to buy two cases of Primus beer and two cases of Amstel beer. For this, she would like to thank Hekima for its support and for empowering female small-business owners. It should be noted that one of the group members is holding a baby.

loans.use: to buy 2 cases of Primus beer and 2 cases of Amstel beer

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: José Rómulo

texts.es: José Romulo aprendió a trabajar con el café desempeñándose primero como jornalero hasta que con el paso del tiempo pudo ahorrar dinero y comprar su propio terreno para así convertirse en productor de café desde hace 38 años. Actualmente José Romulo tiene una producción anual de 10 toneladas de café orgánico, la cuales vende a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que sean exportadas. Una de las preocupaciones que él tiene actualmente es realizar todo los procesos que involucran al café de manera más técnica, ya que así podrá aprovechar mejor los recursos con que cuenta y también logrará una mejor conservación del medio ambiente y su terreno. Para comenzar a llevar a cabo está acción necesita hacer labores de limpieza y preparación de una parte de sus finca y para ello necesita un crédito. A José Romulo en un futuro le gustaría poder ampliar su casa y construir otra para uno de sus hijos. También le gustaría en unos años poder tener un buen patrimonio para cuando tenga que retirarse.
texts.en:
José Romulo learned to work with coffee by first working as a day worker.  He did that until, as time passed, he was able to save money and buy his own land.  He did this 38 years ago in order to become a coffee producer.

José Romulo now produces ten tons of organic coffee annually.  He sells it to the Unión Regional de Huatusco to be exported.  One of the concerns that he now has is performing all of the most technical processes involved with coffee.  This way he would be able to take better advantage of the resources he has.  He would also manage better conservation of the environment and his land.

In order to begin to carry out this action he needs to do cleaning work and to prepare part of his farm.  He needs a loan to do this.  In the future José Romulo would like to be able to expand his house and built another one for his children.  In a few years he would also like to be able to have good assets for when he has to retire.

loans.use: to clean his land and prepare it for planting.

loans.name: Raghad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. Raghad is a youth client, aged 23 years old.  She is married and has two children.

Raghad has a women's beauty salon. She recently opened her business in 2012. But she has good experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and she knows about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is well known in the surrounding areas.

Raghad is requesting a youth loan of $1,800 to decorate her salon. She is aiming to grow her business and develop her skills so she will be able to provide better support to her family.

loans.use: to decorate her salon.

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 24-year-old single man and has been running his father’s automobile spare parts business for more than six years now. His work comprises buying used cars, breaking them down into parts, fixing them if needed, and selling them to his customers. Husein has succeeded in building on his father’s reputation and developing his own. He has good relationships with his clients and neighbors, offering them courteous and quality service with competitive prices.

To keep his business running and to further expand it, Husein needs to ensure the consistent availability of spare parts at his workshop. For this purpose, he is applying for a youth loan from Kiva’s partner, Al Majmoua, to increase his stock of used cars and invest his time in breaking them down into parts. Husein already has had a positive experience in his first loan cycle with Al Majmoua, which contributed to the continuity of his business.

loans.use: to ensure the consistent availability of spare parts at his auto workshop

loans.name: Dukorerehamwe Group

texts.fr:
A.  Marie  fait partie du groupe Dukorerehamwe, et habite à  Bujumbura. C’est une veuve de 54 ans. 

Elle fait le commerce de Restaurant  (haricot, riz, huile de palme,…) depuis 12 ans.

Elle est à son septième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité des produits vivriers (haricot, riz, huile de palme,…) à revendre cuits dans son restaurant.  

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait   poursuivre son commerce de restaurant en le développant.
texts.en:
A. Marie lives in Bujumbura and is a member of the Dukorerehamwe group. She is a 54-year-old widow.

She has been running a restaurant for 12 years (beans, rice, palm oil, etc).

She is requesting her seventh loan from the micro-finance institution Turame. She will use the loan obtained through Kiva to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of food crops (beans, rice, palm oil, etc) that she will cook and sell in her restaurant.

In the coming years, she would like to build and develop her restaurant business.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy many items for her restaurant (beans, rice, palm oil, etc) that she will cook and sell

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Desde los 14 años Jorge comenzó a ayudar a su padre a trabajar en las fincas de café. Él y sus 6 hermanos fueron aprendiendo con el tiempo todo lo necesario para poder desempeñarse en el futuro como productores independientes. Actualmente Jorge tiene 50 años de edad y junto con su esposa Rufina y sus 4 hijos trabajan en los terrenos que le heredó su padre hace ya algún tiempo. El tipo de café que producen es orgánico, pues a Jorge le preocupa el medio ambiente y por esta razón no utiliza fertilizantes que contengan productos químicos. Durante la última cosecha tuvieron una producción total de 2 toneladas ya que a causa de las lluvias no lograron producir todo lo que tenían planeado. Para este año Jorge necesita sembrar nueva planta de café y comprar fertilizantes para su terreno. Esa es la razón por la cual necesita de un crédito. El mayor deseo de Jorge es poder brindarles a todos sus hijos la oportunidad de que estudien una carrera universitaria y nos dijo con orgullo y emoción que en unos días su hija mayor estaría obteniendo el título de Licenciada en Arquitectura.
texts.en:
When he was 14 years old Jorge started to help his father in the coffee fields. He and his six siblings learned all there was to know so they could become independent producers in the future. 

Now Jorge is 50 years old and he and his wife Rufina have four children who work in the fields inherited from their father some time ago. They grow organic coffee as Jorge is concerned about the environment; he does not use fertilizer that contains any chemicals. During the last harvest they produced two tonnes of coffee, not as much as they expected because of the rains.

This year Jorge needs to put in new coffee plants and buy fertilizer, the reason why he would like a loan. His greatest wish is to provide the opportunity for all his children to go to university. He told us with great pride and excitement that his eldest daughter would obtain her degree as an architect in a few days' time.

loans.use: To buy coffee plants and fertilizer

loans.name: Abed El Amir

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. Abed El Amir is 58 years old, married, and has two children.

Abed El Amir has owned a food market since 2007, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken, fish, dairy products, and detergents. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and he knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $3,000 in order to buy a generator and two refrigerators and to install shelves in his shop. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so that he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a generator and two refrigerators and to install shelves in his shop.

loans.name: Monrovian Group

texts.en:
Asma, who is in her late 30s, is married and has one child who goes to school.  She has had a retail shop for two years now. She works from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her 8th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  Asma used the previous loans to restock the missing items in her shop, buy a TV set and a radio, and to pay school fees, and she has paid back all her loans successfully.  She wants a loan to increase her retail shop inventory. Her dream is to one day have a very big retail shop.

Asma will share this loan with her loan group "Monrovian," which has 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her retail shop inventory.

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel is a 44-year-old man. He is married and a father of five sons and three daughters. His elder son is a worker and earns a low salary, which is not enough to cover his needs.

Adel has had a barber shop, which has been a profitable project, but does not yet bring in enough money to cover the family's expenses and cover the costs of work.

Adel is requesting a US $3,000 loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new barber kit, which includes hair and body creams, hair dryers, hair brushes, chairs and mirrors, and to add some new decorations. This will improve the quality of Adel's work and improve the condition of the barber shop, which will help to increase Adel's income.

Adel is photographed in his barber shop.

loans.use: To purchase a new barber kit and add some new decorations

loans.name: Bineta's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été crée le 28 décembre 2011. Les membres habitent le même quartier et exercent toutes la même activité qu'est le petit commerce de draps et habits pour hommes. 

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main la responsable est âgée de 62 ans 

Elle est une veuve et mère de 06 enfants dont 02 garçons et 04 filles. 

Avec le prêt reçu, elle achète des pièces de tissus et des produits pour la teinture.

Les bénéfices générés par l'activité lui permettront de renforcer ses épargnes et subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en:
This group was founded on 28 December 2011. The members live in the same neighbourhood and are all involved in the same business activity, namely the small trade of bed linen and menswear.

The leader of the group is 62 years old. She is standing on the right of the photo with her hand raised.

She is a widow and has 06 children including 02 boys and 04 girls.

She will use the loan to buy pieces of fabric and products for dying material.

The profits she generates with her activity will enable her to increase her savings and meet her needs.

loans.use: to buy fabric and dye in order to make bed linen and menswear for resale.

loans.name: Gladys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gladys se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 16 años de edad, y para generar los ingresos para el hogar trabaja junto con su esposo en una venta de legumbres y verduras que tienen ubicada en el parque principal de su municipio. El negocio ya tiene varios años funcionando y gracias al buen servicio que ofrece y la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes que le permiten tener unas muy buenas ventas y por ende unos ingresos para su hogar. Con su negocio han logrado salir adelante brindándoles a sus 2 hijos una educación de buena calidad y una buena estabilidad económica, por esto trabajan fuertemente en el para conservarlo y seguir haciéndolo crecer para progresar económicamente. Debido a que sus ventas en los últimos meses vienen en aumento, Gladys busca un préstamo para comprar legumbres y verduras para aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrecen a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas.

De esta manera lograrán ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, permitiendo tener mejores ingresos para el hogar y por ende una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es llegar a tener en un futuro su casa propia donde pueda dejar a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
Gladys is married and has two children who are 5 and 16-year-old.  To generate household income she works alongside her husband selling fruit and vegetables in their town’s main park.  They’ve been in business for several years and thanks to the good service she offers and the good quality of the goods she’s acquired a large number of customers who make it possible for her to have good sales and as a result income for her home.

They’ve succeeded in moving forward by means of their business providing their children with a good quality education and good economic stability which is why they work hard to maintain it and continue to make it grow in order to make economic progress.

Because sales lately have been increasing, Gladys is looking for a loan to buy vegetables and fruit to increase the amount of product she offers her customers thus increasing her sales.

In this way they will succeed in offering better customer service and sales will increase considerably allowing them to have better income for the home and thus a better quality of life.  Her dream is to have a house of her own in the future where she can leave her children greater stability.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Lutfiya

texts.en: For more than 10 years, Lutfiya has owned her animal husbandry business. She is the sole breadwinner for her family because she is widow. She has two sons and they are smart and persistent. They help Lutfiya in her business. Lutfiya and her sons buy livestock, take care of them, and sell them to local people. Many of her customers are glad of her work. She has the best livestock and that is why her business is developing day by day. Now, she wants to develop her business further. She is seeking a loan to buy more cattle. She awaits your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle for developing her business.

loans.name: Mama Inuka Group

texts.fr: La cliente Françoise est entrepreneur dynamique ambitieux, Secrétaire du groupe Mama Inuka, âgée de 42 ans, divorcée, mère de 6 enfants.  Elle vend l’huile de palme. Elle  commença son business  avec son fonds propre reçu de son ex mari avant qu’ils divorcent. Environs 2 ans, elle est en activité. Plus tard, elle bénéficia de crédit de l’IMF  Hekima pour renforcer son capital. Elle installe ses produits  au long de la rue dans le quartier Ndosho. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner  avec  les 2 fus d’huile de palme, 2 sacs de riz, 1 sac de haricot. En plus, elle ambitionne augmenter son compte épargne, scolariser, nourrir et vêtir confortablement ses enfants. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres exclus de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client, Françoise, is a dynamic and ambitious entrepreneur. She's the secretary of the group, Mama Inuka, and is 42, divorced, and the mother of 6 children. She has been selling palm oil for about 2 years. 

She started her business with money that she received from her ex-husband before they divorced. Later on, she received a loan from IMF Hekima to reinforce her capital. 

She sells her products on the side of the road in the Ndosho district. She will use this new loan to buy 2 barrels of palm oil, 2 bags of rice, and one bag of beans. 

In addition, she would like to increase her savings. She would also like to educate, feed, and comfortably clothe her children. The client thanks Hekima for their actions to help disadvantaged people excluded from traditional banking.

loans.use: to buy 2 barrels of palm oil, 2 bags of rice, and 1 bag of beans.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Romualda

texts.es: Romualda y su esposo Benito se dedican a producir café desde hace más de 15 años. Al principio trabajaban para otras personas como jornaleros, pero con el tiempo y gracias a su esfuerzo pudieron comprar un terreno en el cual ahora pueden producir su propio café. Romualda reparte su tiempo entre las labores del hogar y los trabajos en la finca, pues para ella es muy importante que sus hijos estén bien atendidos. Durante la última cosecha ella y su esposo lograron una producción de 11 toneladas las cuales entregaron a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que fuera procesado el café y exportado. Para la próxima cosecha ellos necesitan comprar plantas nuevas para siembra y abono orgánico. Por esa razón Romualda está solicitando un crédito el cual pagara pasando la temporada de cosecha, cuando haya vendido todo su café. Actualmente ella tiene un total de 4,500 plantas de café y su meta es para dentro de un año tener un total de 5,500 para asi aumentar la producción. Lo que a ella y a su esposo mas los motiva es poder brindarles en unos años a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria ya que saben que entre mejor preparados estén mayores oportunidades de trabajo tendrán.
texts.en: Romualda and Benito, her husband, have been coffee producers for more than 15 years. At first they worked for other people as day workers, but with time and thanks to their effort, they were able to buy land, the same land on which they now produce their own coffee. Romualda splits her time between her domestic duties and her work duties on the farm, as for her it is very important that her children be well-attended to. During the last harvest, they were able to get 11 tons of coffee, which they took over to the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” to be processed and exported. For the next harvest, they need to buy new coffee plants to sow and organic fertilizer. That’s why Romualda is asking for a loan, which she will pay back after the harvest, when she’s finished selling all of her coffee. Currently, she has 4,500 coffee plants and her goal is to have 5,500 in a year, in order to increase production. She and her husband are motivated because in a few years they’d like to be able to offer their children the opportunity to go to university; they know that the better prepared their children, the more work opportunities they’ll have.

loans.use: buy new coffee plants to sow and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Jose Aralfo

texts.es:
Jose se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos, y para generar los ingresos para su hogar trabaja como mayordomo de una finca. En la actividad lleva varios años y esto le ha permitido tener muy buena experiencia, y ahora tiene una gran oportunidad que le esta brindando su empleador que no quiere dejar pasar. Su empleador le permitirá tener ganado de levante en la finca para que Jose aumente sus ingresos y sin tener que pagar alguna suma de dinero por el terreno donde podrá cuidar el ganado; es por esto que Jose requiere un préstamo para comprar ganado y así comenzar con la actividad generando mejores ingresos para su hogar.

De esta manera podrá aumentar sus ingresos considerablemente, permitiendo tener en su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Su mayor sueño es en un futuro tener su propia finca y allí tener la crianza del ganado y también dejarles a sus hijos un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
José is married and has four children.   To generate household income he works as a foreman on a hacienda.  He’s been in this line of work for several years and has gained good experience.  

Now, he has a great opportunity his employer is offering him that he doesn’t want to pass up.  His employer is letting him keep cattle on the ranch so that he can increase his income without having to pay any money for the land where he’ll care for the cattle.  This is why José needs a loan to buy cattle and start this activity and generate better income for his home.

In this way he will be able to increase his income considerably allowing his family to have a better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.  His greatest dream is to have his own farm in the future and to raise cattle there and also to leave his children a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es:
Eliana se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 12 y 13 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que desde hace aproximadamente 12 años tiene su propio negocio el cual montó con mucho esfuerzo, donde ofrece insumos para la confección y además dicta clases de confección de disfraces y muñecos. Con esto, ha logrado contribuir económicamente en su hogar para que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. En vista que se acerca una temporada donde sus ventas aumentan considerablemente, y ya que no cuenta con un capital suficiente para poder surtir su negocio, busca un préstamo que le permita comprar insumos como telas, hilos, agujas y demás insumos que requiere para tener su negocio bien surtido para la temporada.

De esta manera logrará tener buenas ventas ofreciendo a sus clientes buena variedad de productos. Además, seguirá garantizando en su hogar unos ingresos con los que sus hijos seguirán teniendo acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Eliana is married and has two children, ages 12 and 13.  She has always wanted to give them a good quality of life.  That is why she has had her own business for approximately 12 years.  She started it with a great deal of effort.  She sells sewing supplies, and she also teaches classes on making costumes and dolls.  By doing this she has managed to financially contribute to her household so that her family has a better quality of life and greater financial opportunities to get ahead.

In light of the fact that the season when her sales increase considerably is getting close, and that she does not have enough capital to be able to stock her business, she is looking for a loan.  The loan will allow her to buy supplies like fabric, thread, needles, and other supplies that she needs in order to have a well-stocked business for the season.

This way she will manage to have good sales and offer her customers a good variety of products.  Also, she will continue to have guaranteed household income for her children to continue having access to a quality education.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fabric, thread, needles, and other supplies that she needs in order to have a well-stocked business for the season.

loans.name: Margret Talang

texts.en:
Margret Talang is a 33-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has two children who are 5 and 7. Both of them go to school. 

Margret Talang runs a vegetable-selling business, and she has been doing this for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking out a loan of 2,500 SDG to purchase greens and many other items. She has no other source of income. 

In five years, Margret Talang would like to expand her business. 

Her major challenges include the high market prices. 

Margret Talang says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through Kiva.

loans.use: To buy items like greens, avocados, apples, etc.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Miss Nazia is 28 years old and she is unmarried. She has four members in her family. Her mother is an old lady and accompanies her during her meetings with vendors and workers in different cities, her brother is disabled, and her younger sister is studying in ninth grade. 

Nazia works very hard to provide for her family. She is running her business of making laces for garments in Lahore, Pakistan. She collects the orders from the market and gets this work done by freelance workers by providing them with required raw material according to demand for the product. 

She has requested a 20,000 Pakistan Rupee (PKR) loan for purchase of raw material, e.g., cloth, ribbons, thread, artificial pearls, etc. for making new styles of laces.

Nazia has applied for this first-time loan from Kashf Foundation. She has good contacts in the market and she can expand this business subject to availability of capital.

Nazia has a strong motive to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to make laces for garments.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Mrs. Tahira is a very hardworking lady. She is working to improve the living standard of her family and to meet basic necessities adequately. 

Tahira is married and has six children. Two of her daughters are helping her in her business of stitching clothes, and the remaining four children are studying in school. She always wanted to provide them with a quality education. 

Approximately ten years ago she decided to start her own business. She has a clothing and tailoring business. She purchases clothes from the market and stitches those clothes and sells them to the customers at a very reasonable price. She also has her own line of clothing. 

Owing to the good quality of her work, she gets many orders from her customers on a regular basis.Tahira has been working with Kashf for the last four years. Currently she has requested a loan of Pakistan Rupee 25,000 for the purchase of clothes and raw material.

She is providing training to her daughters so that they can expand the business and increase income for her household so that her whole family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and raw material for stitching.

loans.name: La Rose Group

texts.fr: La cliente Zuzu est un entrepreneur courageux, membre du groupe La rose,  âgée de 25 ans, marié, mère de 2 jeunes enfants, tous étudient confortablement. Son mari est chômeur. Elle vendeuse d’habillements (pantalons, robes enfants, etc.). Elle  commença son entreprise  avec son fonds propre reçu de son mari. Environs 4 ans, elle exerce cette activité. Plus tard, elle bénéficia de crédit de l’IMF  Hekima. Elle installe ses marchandises  au long de la rue, parfois elle circule dans la ville avec ses marchandise pour exciter la clientèle. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec  15 pantalons, des t-shirts, etc. En plus, elle ambitionne ouvrir une boutique.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres exclus de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client, Zuzu, is a courageous entrepreneur. A member of the group, La rose, she's 25 years old, married, and the mother of two young children. Both of her children are in school. Her husband is unemployed. 

She has been selling clothing (pants, children's dresses, etc.) for about 4 years. She started her company with money received from her husband.

Later on, she received a loan from IMF Hekima. She sells her goods on the side of the road, and sometimes she brings her goods around town to entice her clients. 

This new loan will help her buy 15 pairs of pants, t-shirts, etc. In addition, she would like to open a boutique. 

The client thanks Hekima for their actions to help disadvantaged people excluded from traditional banking.

loans.use: 15 pairs of pants, t-shirts, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Desde muy chica Virginia aprendió a trabajar en los cultivos de café al lado de su padre quien le enseñó todo lo necesario para que cuando ella se casara pudiera ayudar a su marido a trabajar. Actualmente ella está casada con Noé, quien también es productor de café y juntos realizan las labores que requiere día a día la finca de café para tener una buena producción. Virginia también se encarga de las labores del hogar así como de atender a sus 3 hijos. El café que ellos producen es de tipo convencional y quieren cambiar su producción a café orgánico, ya que es de mejor calidad y no daña al medio ambiente, pues no utiliza fertilizantes con productos químicos. Para comenzar a llevar a cabo este proceso necesitan comprar nueva planta de café y abono. Es por esta razón que ella está solicitando un crédito. Virginia es socia de la “unión Regional de Huatusco” desde hace algunos años y es allí en donde vende toda su producción de café cada año. Otra de las metas que Virginia tiene a largo plazo es comprar dos hectáreas más de terreno para así poder aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Ever since she was very young, Virginia learned how to work in the coffee fields along with her father, who taught her everything she needed to know so that when she got married she could help her husband work. She is currently married to Noé, who is also a coffee farmer, and together they do all the necessary work in the coffee plantation so that it yields good harvests. Virginia is also in charge of taking care of the home and their three children. 
The coffee beans they produce are conventional, and they want to switch to organic coffee, because the quality is better and it doesn't harm the environment, since it doesn't use fertilizers that contain chemicals. To start implementing this process, they need to purchase new coffee plants and fertilizer. That is why she is requesting a loan.
Virginia has been a member of Unión Regional de Huatusco for a few years and that is where she sells all the coffee they produce every year. Another of Virginia's long-term goals is to purchase another two hectares of land (nearly 5 acres) in order to increase production.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer and coffee plants.

loans.name: Rubén

texts.es: Desde hace varias generaciones la familia de Rubén se ha dedicado al café, así que desde que era un niño comenzó ayudando a su padre en las fincas haciendo labores de limpieza y corte. Con el paso de los años fue adquiriendo todo el conocimiento y experiencia necesaria para poder independizarse y producir su propio café. Rubén se levanta diariamente desde muy temprano para ir a revisar sus cafetales y ver si no hace falta algo. Hay temporadas en las que no hay mucho que hacer más que esperar a que comience a dar frutos la planta, pero durante las épocas de cosecha que es cuando hay más trabajo a Rubén lo ayudan sus hijos y su esposa a cortar el café. La producción de Rubén es en su totalidad de café orgánico y durante el último año logró llegar a cosechar 8.5 toneladas las cuales vendió a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que sean exportadas. Este año Rubén quiere aumentar su producción y para eso necesita sembrar 1,000 nuevas plantas y comprar abono. Él está solicitando un crédito para poder llevar a cabo esta inversión. En un futuro le gustaría comprar un terreno para poder aumentar su patrimonio y ya está ahorrando el dinero que necesita para esto.
texts.en: For many generations, Rubén’s family has produced coffee; as a child, he began helping his father in the farm cutting and cleaning. With the passing of years, Rubén began amassing the necessary knowledge and experience to be able to grow his own coffee, independently. Rubén wakes up early every day to look over his coffee plants to make sure they’re in good shape. There are times when there’s not much one can do but wait to see the plant budding. During the busier times, like the harvest, his wife and children help cut the coffee. The whole production of organic coffee and during the last year, Rubén produced 8.5 tons of which he sold to the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” to be exported. This year Rubén wants to ncrease production and for that, he’ll need to sow 1,000 new coffee plants and buy organic fertilizer. He’s requesting a loan in order to make this investment happen. In the future he’d like to buy a plot of land to add to his assets; he’s already saving money for this.

loans.use: buy coffee plants and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Libardo Antonio

texts.es:
Libardo se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 18 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar el acceso a una educación de buena calidad, sin embargo las dificultades económicas no se lo han permitido y gracias a su negocio poco a poco ha venido progresando. Tiene una venta de frutas a las afueras de un colegio donde ya lleva ubicado hace aproximadamente 10 años, y con este negocio genera los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar para sostener los gastos que de allí se derivan. Su actividad la desempeña en un carrito que ya tiene mucho tiempo de estarlo usando y esto ha traído consigo una serie de dificultades que ha comenzado a mostrar el carrito, por esto busca un préstamo para reparar el carrito donde ofrece sus mangos.

De esta manera logrará superar la dificultad de capital y seguir progresando junto con su familia, de modo que podrán tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Libardo’s married and has two children who are 16 and 18 years of age who he’s always wanted to provide access to a good education.  However, economic difficulties have prevented him from doing so but thanks to his business he’s gradually been making progress.

He sells fruit outside a school where he’s been located for approximately 10 years.  He generates income needed to cover household expenses that arise through this business .  

He carries out his activity with a cart that he’s been using for a long time which has brought a series of difficulties that have started to arise with the cart which is why he’s looking for a loan to repair the cart he uses to sell his mangoes.

In this way, he will overcome the difficulty of capital and will continue making progress with his family so that they can have a better quality of life and improved economic opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to repair his cart.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena se encuentra casada y tiene 11 hijos a quienes con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante brindándoles todo lo necesario, y para contribuir económicamente en su hogar tiene una panadería donde también ofrece productos de la canasta familiar y algunos snack. La actividad la aprendió gracias a un curso y así sacó adelante su propio negocio, y poco a poco ha venido creciendo. Actualmente sus hijos mayores le colaboran en su panadería y esto le permite tener una muy buena atención a sus clientes, los cuales cada vez vienen aumentando gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos. Debido a que su panadería la montó con muy bajo capital, aún no cuenta con suficiente capacidad de producción para poder satisfacer toda la demanda en su panadería, por esto ahora que viene creciendo cada vez más busca un préstamo que le permita comprar insumos que requiere para la preparación de los productos que ofrece en su panadería. 

De esta manera logrará seguir saliendo adelante y así poder tener una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Además, seguirá garantizando los ingresos necesarios para que sus hijos menores sigan estudiando y puedan salir adelante.
texts.en:
Magdalena is married and has 11 children whom she has managed to get ahead through great effort; providing them with all they need.  In order to contribute financially to her household, she has a bakery where she also offers family products and some snacks.  She learned to do this thanks to a course she took and then she moved forward with her own business and grew it little by little.  Currently her oldest children help at the bakery and this allows her to provide good service to her customers, which are constantly increasing in numbers, thanks to the quality of her products.  Because she started her bakery with low capital, she doesn’t have sufficient production capital to be able to satisfy all of her customer demands, so now that the business is growing, she is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy supplies so that she can prepare the products she offers in her bakery. 

In this way she can continue getting ahead and in this way be able to have a good quality of life in her home.  She will all also continue to guarantee her necessary income so that her young children can continue in school and be able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es:
Jonathan es un joven emprendedor proveniente de una familia con muy bajos recursos económicos, y esto le permitió querer salir adelante para brindarles a sus padres la posibilidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida. Desde que se encontraba terminando sus estudios comenzó a trabajar en la actividad de la herrería, y así poco a poco comenzó a conocer la actividad y generar los primeros ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Actualmente tiene 21 años de edad y gracias a la experiencia que tiene es reconocido por realizar trabajos de muy buena calidad, y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenos clientes que cada vez aumentan más. En la actualidad tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero presenta la dificultad de no poseer capital para comprar la gran cantidad de materia prima que requiere, por esto busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas como acero, aluminio, y varillas para poder elaborar los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene y así logrará salir adelante en su taller. Además de que generará mayores ingresos para que sus padres puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y progresarán económicamente.
texts.en:
Jonathan is a young entrepreneur who comes from a family of very few economic resources which led him to want to get ahead in order to provide his parents with the possibility of having a better quality of life.  

He started working as a blacksmith when he was still finishing his schooling and gradually learned the activity and started earning his first income to contribute economically at home.  He’s currently 21-years-old and thanks to the experience he’s gained he’s well-known for doing very good quality work which has led to having very good customers who are increasing in number all the time.

He  currently has large pending customer orders but he faces the difficulty of not having capital to buy the large amounts of raw materials he needs which is why he’s looking for a loan to buy raw materials like steel, aluminum and metal rods to be able to manufacture the large orders his customers have placed.

In this way he will overcome the problem of capital and will be able to get ahead with his shop.  In addition, he will generate increased income so that his parents can have better quality of life and make economic progress.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es:
Jorge es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado su hijo adelante brindándole una educación de buena calidad y una estabilidad económica en el hogar. Separado y padre de su único hijo de 22 años, Jorge aprendió la actividad de la herrería por medio de su padre desde que era muy joven, y gracias a que ya tiene experiencia de aproximadamente 35 años en la actividad ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes motivados principalmente por la calidad de sus trabajos. Principalmente fabrica herraduras que vende en su gran mayoría a un comerciante de otro municipio que las vende al minorista, y de esta manera genera los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para pagar los gastos que allí se generan y brindarle a su hijo una educación universitaria. Debido a que en el momento tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder comprar las materias primas, Jorge busca un préstamo que le permita comprar materias primas como varilla y carbón industrial para fabricar los grandes pedidos que tiene por parte de sus clientes.

De esta manera logrará superar la dificultad de capital y así seguirá progresando en su taller generando más ingresos para que en su hogar puedan tener una buena calidad de vida. Su mayor anhelo es ver a su hijo graduándose de la universidad y verlo progresar.
texts.en:
Jorge is a very hardworking person who has raised his son with much effort giving him a good quality education and economic stability at home.  He’s separated and the father of his only son who is 22-years-old.

Jorge learned to be a blacksmith when he was very young from his father and because he now has approximately 35 years’ experience in this activity he’s managed to secure a large clientele who are motivated primarily by the quality of his work.  

He primarily manufactures horseshoes that he sells for the most part to a merchant in another town who sells them at retail.  He generates income this way needed for his home to cover expenses that arise there and to provide his son with a university education.  

Because at the moment he has large pending customer orders but does not have sufficient capital to buy the needed raw materials, Jorge is looking for a loan to buy raw materials like metal rods and industrial coal to manufacture the large orders he has from his customers.

In this way he will succeed in overcoming the problem of capital and continue to make progress in his shop generating more income so that his home will have a good quality of life.  His greatest wish is to see his son graduate from university and to see him make progress.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Sok Kean

texts.en:
Sok Kean is 37 years old and her husband, Channa (pictured together) is 40 years old, have been married since 1997 and they have five children, who all attend school. The family lives in a village about 28 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sok Kean and her husband are rice and vegetable farmers. She wants a trailer to connect to a motorized hand tiller (in the photo). It would be easy for her to transport her rice and vegetable when farming season comes.  

Hence, Sok Kean decided to ask for her first loan in order to a buy trailer and she will also use rest money of the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her farm.

loans.use: To buy a trailer and purchase seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her farm.

loans.name: Guilda

texts.en:
Guilda is a 28-year-old married woman and mother of two children. Three years ago, she opened up a clothing store, offering a variety of men's, women's, children's and baby apparel. Though she suffered in the beginning from lack of capital, Guilda succeeded in building a good reputation in her neighborhood as an honest saleswoman with high quality clothing.

Guilda is applying for a youth loan from Kiva’s partner, Al Majmoua, to buy a car. She will use it to move between home and work as well as transfer her merchandise from the wholesalers to her shop. This way, Guilda will considerably reduce her transportation expenses and save more money to invest in her future expansion plans.

loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 16 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una educación de buena calidad, es por esto que al ver que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, comenzó a trabajar para contribuir económicamente en la familia. Fue así como consiguió empleo como vendedora y allí trabajó durante un largo tiempo; pero hace unos meses identificó la necesidad en su sector de una tienda de comida y artículos para mascotas y con unos ahorros y mucho esfuerzo y comenzó su propio negocio. Hace unos pocos meses que tiene su negocio y gracias a su buena atención poco a poco ha venido creciendo, es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar una estantería y una vitrina para exhibir los productos ya que aumentará la variedad de productos que ofrece.

De esta manera logrará satisfacer más necesidades de sus clientes y sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente. Su mayor sueño es seguir creciendo y en un futuro llegar a tener una gran venta de productos para mascotas y tener allí mismo una peluquería y guardería para las mascotas.
texts.en:
Maria is married with 2 children, 9 and 16 years of age. Maria has always wanted to provide her children with a quality education and when she realized her husband’s income wouldn’t be enough to maintain the household expenses, she began to work in order to contribute financially to the family. That’s why she found work as a salesperson and worked for a long time; but, a few months ago, she was able to identify a need in her area for a pet store with food and articles for pets. With savings and much effort, she started her own business. She’s only had it for a few months and thanks to her attention, it is growing little by little. She’s requesting a loan to buy a shelf and a showcase so she can exhibit her products as she plans to increase the variety of products she offers. That way she can readily satisfy more of her clients’ needs and her sales will increase considerably. 

Her biggest dream is to grow her business and in the future have a big store with products for pets and also have a groomer and daycare for pets.

loans.use: buy a shelf and a showcase so she can exhibit her products, as she plans to increase the variety of products she offers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a coverstitch machine that will allow her to finish the sewing process in her shop.

loans.name: Danilo Alberto

texts.es:
Danilo se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos a quienes les quiere brindar la oportunidad de tener una educación universitaria, pero debido a la situación económica de la familia esto se ha visto un poco en dificultades y por esto sigue trabajando fuertemente en su negocio para ofrecerles esta educación a sus hijos. Desde hace más de 30 años se ha desempeñado en la actividad, ya que desde muy temprana edad aprendió la actividad de la venta de sombreros y demás artículos personales por parte de su hermano y así pagó sus propios gastos desde muy joven. Actualmente tiene muy buenas ventas, pero presenta la dificultad de que no se encuentra ubicado en un local, lo que hace que a menudo sea difícil salir adelante con el negocio. Debido a que se aproxima la temporada donde sus productos se venden en mayores cantidades, Danilo busca un préstamo para comprar sombreros y demás productos de uso personal para tener buen surtido para la temporada.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene y así podrá salir adelante con su negocio teniendo una buena calidad de vida en su hogar gracias a los ingresos que este le brinda.
texts.en:
Danilo is married and has two children. He would like to provide them with the opportunity of getting a college education, but because of the family's financial situation, this plan has run into some difficculties, which is why he keeps working hard in his business, so that he can offer his children an education.
He has been in the business of selling hats and other personal items for over thirty years, since he learned the trade at a very early age from his brother and that was how he covered his expenses ever since he was very young. His sales are currently very good, but the problem he faces is that he doesn't have a business location, which often makes it difficcult to get the business going. Since the time of year is approaching when his products are sold the most, Danilo is requesting a loan in order to purchase hats and other products for personal use, so that he is well-stocked for the season. 
This will allow him to overcome the problems he has with capital, and he will be able to get ahead with his business while having a good quality of life at home, thanks to the income it will provide.

loans.use: to purchase hats and other personal items so that he is well-stocked for the season.

loans.name: Nelson Augusto

texts.es:
Nelson se capacitó en la actividad de la reparación de artículos eléctricos y desde hace 2 años tiene su propio taller donde ofrece el servicio a las personas de su municipio; y gracias a esta actividad genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 2, 11, 16 y 17 años de edad. Anteriormente la situación económica en su hogar se encontraba en grandes dificultades, pero con un gran esfuerzo Nelson ha logrado sacar este taller adelante y a pesar de que no fue montado con mucho capital y aún le hacen falta algunas herramientas para trabajar, su taller le ha permitido brindarles a sus hijos el acceso a una educación de buena calidad. Con el ánimo de mejorar su trabajo, Nelson busca un préstamo para comprar herramientas manuales y 2 soldadores eléctricos que le permitan realizar su trabajo con mejor calidad.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene para mejorar sus herramientas de trabajo y también logrará tener un mejor servicio para sus clientes. Además podrá brindar en su hogar mejores ingresos para que así su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Nelson received training in the area of electrical item repairs. For two years he has had his own workshop where he offers the service to people in his municipality. Thanks to this business he generates the necessary income for covering household expenses in the home he shares with his wife and four children who are 2, 11, 16 and 17 years old. Previously the financial situation in his home was very tenuous, but with great effort Nelson has been able to bring this workshop along. In spite of the fact that he got started without much capital and he still lacks some tools for his work, his workshop has allowed him to offer his children access to a good quality education. In hopes of improving his work, Nelson is seeking a loan for purchasing hand tools and two electric soldering irons which will allow him to do better quality work. 

Thus he will overcome the difficulty of having insufficient capital in order to improve his equipment and will also be able to provide better service to his customers. Furthermore he will be able to provide better income to his home so his family will have a better quality of life and better financial opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to purchase hand tools and two electric soldering irons which will allow him to do better quality work.

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es:
Pablo se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos de 9, 15, 16 y 19 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, es por esto que trabaja fuertemente en su negocio para poder generar ingresos con los cuales en su hogar puedan acceder a unas buenas oportunidades económicas. Durante 17 años trabajó para una empresa donde devengaba un mal salario que no le alcanzaba para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, y por las pocas oportunidades que tenía en el momento para mejorar esta condición debía seguir trabajando fuertemente para otras personas. Desde hace un tiempo dejó la empresa y ahora se dedica a trabajar por su propia cuenta con su negocio de venta de helados y refrescos, negocio con el cual su familia ha tenido la oportunidad de progresar financieramente. Debido a que tiene grandes ventas en esta temporada y no cuenta con suficiente capital, Pablo requiere un préstamo que le permita comprar insumos que requiere para la preparación de los helados y los refrescos y ya se han agotado.

De esta manera superará la dificultad de capital que tiene y podrá seguir teniendo en su negocio una buena atención a los clientes. Su mayor anhelo es tener su casa propia donde pueda brindarle a sus 4 hijos y su esposa una buena calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica que les permita progresar.
texts.en:
Pablo is married and has four children who are 9, 15, 16 and 19 years old who he’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life for which is why he works hard in his business to be able to generate income so that they can have access to good economic opportunities at home.

He worked for a firm for 17 years but earned a salary that was insufficient to cover all his household expenses and because of the few opportunities he had at that time to improve this situation he had to continue working hard for others.  

Some time ago he left the firm and now works for himself in his business selling ice-cream and soft-drinks, a business that has given his family the opportunity to make economic progress.  Because sales increase this season and he does not have sufficient capital, Pablo needs a loan to buy the supplies he needs to prepare his ice-cream and the soft-drinks that he’s run out of.

In this way he will overcome the problem of capital he has and will be able to continue providing good customer service in his business.  His greatest wish is to own a house where he can provide his four children and his wife with a good quality of life and economic stability that will allow them to make progress.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis Fernando es una persona muy trabajadora que desde hace aproximadamente 26 años aprendió la actividad de la agricultura por parte de sus padres quienes se la enseñaron desde muy temprana edad, y esto le ha permitido sacar a su familia de cuenta de esta actividad y también ser muy reconocido por la buena calidad de sus productos. Tiene un cultivo de verduras que le ha permitido generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar, sin embargo, en muchas ocasiones el mercado no ofrece muchas posibilidades y la situación económica de la familia se ve en grandes dificultades. Actualmente tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, el cual aspira a cubrir con su actual cosecha, pero debido a problemas del invierno esta se ha venido deteriorando un poco, por esto ahora busca un préstamo para comprar insumos como abonos y riegos que le permitan sacar adelante su cultivo a pesar del invierno.

De esta manera logrará sacar sus productos con muy buena calidad y venderlos a muy buen precio, de modo que su familia tendrá unos buenos ingresos que les garantizará una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis Fernando is a hardworking person who has been learning to farm for about 26 years since his parents began teaching him when he was very young.  This allowed him to take over for his family, and he is also very well-known for the good quality of his products.  He has a crop of vegetables that has allowed him to generate the income required in his home, however on many occasions, the market did not offer many possibilities and his family's financial situation has been difficult.  

Currently he has many orders from his customers, which he hopes will cover his current harvest, but due to problems this winter, his crop has been deteriorating a little.  He is asking for this loan to purchase items such as fertilizer and irrigation equipment which will allow him to improve his crop this winter.  In this way, he will succeed in having good quality products to sell at a good price so that his family will have a good income which will guarantee a good quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase items such as fertilizer and irrigation equipment to improve his crops during the winter.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 24 years old, single and lives with four family members.

Ahmad works in the business of repairing vehicles. He has had a small garage since 2009. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $2400 to pay the rent for the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the shop

loans.name: María Luz Dary

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos de 7, 15 y 18 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido garantizar el acceso a una educación de buena calidad, es por esto que desde hace unos 12 años aproximadamente comenzó a trabajar en busca de unos ingresos para su hogar con los que pudiera contribuir junto con su esposo para tener una buena estabilidad económica en el hogar. Cuando comenzó con su negocio era demasiado pequeño y era difícil conseguir clientes para este, pero gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y la buena atención que ofrecía poco a poco fue captando más clientes y así hacer su negocio más rentable. En la actualidad tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero debido a que no cuenta con suficiente capital para poder surtir su negocio, Maria busca un préstamo para comprar ropa de las referencias que se han agotado para satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes.
 
De esta manera seguirá teniendo unos ingresos que le garantizarán a las personas en su hogar seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para seguir progresando, de modo que puedan tener una estabilidad en el hogar para salir adelante. Su mayor anhelo es conseguir su casa propia, por esto trabaja fuertemente en pro de ello.
texts.en:
María’s married and has three children who are 7, 15 and 18 years of age who she’s always wanted to guarantee access to a good quality education which is why she started working about 12 years ago to generate household income to help her husband provide good economic stability for their home.

When she started her business it was too small and difficult to attract customers but thanks to the good quality of her products and the good service she offered she gradually won over more customers and made her business more profitable.

She currently has large customer orders but for lack of capital has been unable to stock her store.  María is looking for a loan to buy the clothes she’s run out of in order to fill customer orders.

In this way she will continue earning income which will insure that people living in her home will continue to have a good quality of life and better economic opportunities to continue making progress so that they will have stability at home to continue moving forward.  Her greatest wish is to get a house of her own and she works hard to do so.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Maria Lindelly

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy trabajadora, es por esto que al ver que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no son suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar decidió montar su propio negocio en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades económicas para el hogar para que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Fue así como montó un negocio donde ofrece fritos a sus clientes y gracias al cual la situación económica de su hogar ha mejorado considerablemente. En su negocio ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes que le permiten tener muy buenas ventas y esto se ve traducido en que su negocio crezca rápidamente. Actualmente no cuenta con mucho capital para poder seguir capitalizando su negocio, es por esto que requiere un préstamo para comprar insumos como papas, maduros y demás insumos que se han venido agotando en su negocio.
